12470447.name: Curse of Fiend
12470447.text: Changes the battle positions of all Attack Position monsters on the field to Defense Position and vice-versa. These positions cannot be changed during the turn this card is activated except by the effects of a Magic, Trap, or Effect Monster Card. You can activate this card only during your Standby Phase.

2926176.name: Curse of Royal
2926176.text: Negate the activation of a Spell or Trap Card that includes the effect of destroying 1 Spell or Trap Card and destroy it.

94377247.name: Curse of the Masked Beast
94377247.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "The Masked Beast". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Level Stars equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

58851034.name: Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell
58851034.text: Discard 1 Spell Card. Negate the activation and the effect of a Spell Card and destroy it. Your opponent cannot activate Spell Cards with that name during the rest of this Duel.

30655537.name: Cyber Falcon
30655537.text: A jet-powered hawk that travels at the speed of sound.

80316585.name: Cyber Harpie Lady
80316585.text: This card's name is treated as "Harpie Lady".

34124316.name: Cyber Jar
34124316.text: FLIP: Destroy all monsters on the field, then both players reveal the top 5 cards from their Decks, then Special Summon all revealed Level 4 or lower monsters in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, also add any remaining cards to their hand. (If either player has less than 5 cards in their Deck, reveal as many as possible.)

39978267.name: Cyber Raider
39978267.text:
When this card is Normal Summoned, Flip Summoned, or Special Summoned successfully, select and activate 1 of the following effects: 
Select 1 Equip Card equipped to 1 monster on the field and destroy it.
Select 1 Equip Card equipped to 1 monster on the field and equip it to this card.

75559356.name: Cyber Soldier of the Darkworld
75559356.text: A mechanical soldier that won't stop attacking until all of its life readings have been extinguished from its sensors.

69015963.name: Cyber-Stein
69015963.text: Pay 5000 Life Points. Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck to the field in Attack Position.

5494820.name: Cyclon Laser
5494820.text: You can only equip this card to Gradius". Increase the ATK of "Gradius" by 300 points. When the equipped "Gradius" attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points."

81057959.name: D. Human
81057959.text: Gifted with the power of dragons, this warrior wields a sword created from a dragon's fang.

2833249.name: D. Tribe
2833249.text: All monsters on your side of the field are treated as Dragon-Types until the End Phase of this turn.

70074904.name: D.D. Assailant
70074904.text: After damage calculation, when this card is destroyed by battle with an opponent's monster: Banish that monster, also banish this card.

60912752.name: D.D. Borderline
60912752.text: While there are no Spell Cards in your Graveyard, neither player can conduct their Battle Phase.

48148828.name: D.D. Crazy Beast
48148828.text: A monster that this card destroys as a result of battle is removed from play.

33423043.name: D.D. Designator
33423043.text: Declare 1 card name. Look at your opponent's hand, and if he/she has the declared card in his/her hand, remove that 1 card from play. If he/she doesn't have the declared card in his/her hand, remove 1 random card in your hand from play.

8628798.name: D.D. Dynamite
8628798.text: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each of their removed from play cards.

3773196.name: D.D. Scout Plane
3773196.text: If this card is removed from play, Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position during the End Phase of this turn.

48092532.name: D.D. Survivor
48092532.text: During the End Phase, if this card was banished while face-up, on your side of the field, this turn: Special Summon this banished card. This effect can only activate once per turn.

86498013.name: D.D. Trainer
86498013.text: A poor goblin that was sucked into a different dimension. However, he's doing his best with his new destiny.

7572887.name: D.D. Warrior Lady
7572887.text: After damage calculation, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that monster, also banish this card.

59983499.name: Dancing Elf
59983499.text: An elf that dances across the sky with wings of razor-sharp blades.

90925163.name: Dancing Fairy
90925163.text: As long as this card remains in face-up Defense Position on your side of the field, increase your Life Points by 1000 points during each of your Standby Phases.

41949033.name: Dark Assailant
41949033.text: Armed with the Psycho Sword, this sinister assassin rules the bad land.

80071763.name: Dark Balter the Terrible
80071763.text: A fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. When a Normal Spell Card is activated, negate the effect by paying 1000 Life Points. The effect of an Effect Monster that this monster destroys as a result of battle is negated.

67049542.name: Dark Bat
67049542.text: Bats from the netherworld that use their hyper senses to detect their enemies.

11321183.name: Dark Blade
11321183.text: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

86805855.name: Dark Blade the Dragon Knight
86805855.text:
Dark Blade + "Pitch-Dark Dragon"
Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can select up to 3 Monster Cards from your opponent's Graveyard and remove them from play.

8634636.name: Dark Cat with White Tail
8634636.text: FLIP: Return 2 Monster Cards on your opponent's side of the field and 1 Monster Card on your side of the field to their owners' hands.

1804528.name: Dark Coffin
1804528.text:
When this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, your opponent selects and executes 1 of the following effects: 
Discard 1 random card in their hand.
Select 1 monster on their side of the field and destroy it.

70231910.name: Dark Core
70231910.text: Discard 1 card. Remove from play 1 face-up monster.

78053598.name: Dark Designator
78053598.text: Declare 1 Monster Card name. If the declared card is in your opponent's Deck, add 1 of that card to your opponent's hand.

65287621.name: Dark Driceratops
65287621.text: During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.

89111398.name: Dark Dust Spirit
89111398.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, return it to its owner's hand. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, destroy all other face-up monsters.

21417692.name: Dark Elf
21417692.text: This card requires a cost of 1000 of your own Life Points to attack.

4614116.name: Dark Energy
4614116.text: A Fiend-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

90928333.name: Dark Factory of Mass Production
90928333.text: Select 2 Normal Monsters from your Graveyard and add them to your hand.

13722870.name: Dark Flare Knight
13722870.text:
Dark Magician + "Flame Swordsman"
Any damage to this card's controller caused as a result of battle involving this monster becomes 0. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, Special Summon 1 "Mirage Knight" from your hand or Deck.

9159938.name: Dark Gray
9159938.text: Entirely gray, this beast has rarely been seen by mortal eyes.

53129443.name: Dark Hole
53129443.text: Destroy all monsters on the field.

90980792.name: Dark Jeroid
90980792.text: When this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; it loses 800 ATK.

53375573.name: Dark King of the Abyss
53375573.text: It's said that this King of the Netherworld once had the power to rule over the dark.

2314238.name: Dark Magic Attack
2314238.text: Activate only while you control a face-up "Dark Magician". Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

46986414.name: Dark Magician
46986414.text: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

38033121.name: Dark Magician Girl
38033121.text: This card gains 300 ATK for every "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in any Graveyard.

50725996.name: Dark Magician Knight
50725996.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Knight's Title". If this card is Special Summoned successfully, select 1 card on the field and destroy it.

40737112.name: Dark Magician of Chaos
40737112.text: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Spell Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand. Banish any monster destroyed by battle with this card. If this face-up card would leave the field, banish it instead.

97642679.name: Dark Master - Zorc
97642679.text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Contract with the Dark Master". Once per turn: You can roll 1 six-sided die, then destroy all monsters your opponent controls if you roll 1 or 2, destroy 1 monster your opponent controls if you roll 3, 4 or 5, or destroy all monsters you control if you roll 6.

74713516.name: Dark Mimic LV1
74713516.text:
FLIP: Draw 1 card.
During your Standby Phase: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Dark Mimic LV3" from your hand or Deck.

1102515.name: Dark Mimic LV3
1102515.text: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card, but if this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Dark Mimic LV1", draw 2 cards instead.

20522190.name: Dark Mirror Force
20522190.text: You can only activate this card when your opponent's monster declares an attack. Remove all monsters in Defense Position on your opponent's side of the field from play.

31829185.name: Dark Necrofear
31829185.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 3 Fiend-Type monsters in your Graveyard. If this card is destroyed by battle, or by your opponent's card effect while it is a Monster Card, equip it to a monster your opponent controls during the End Phase of this turn. Take control of the equipped monster.

98502113.name: Dark Paladin
98502113.text:
"Dark Magician" + "Buster Blader"
This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. While this card is face-up on the field, you can discard 1 card to negate the activation of a Spell Card and destroy it. This card gains 500 ATK for each Dragon-Type monster on the field and in either player's Graveyard.

85562745.name: Dark Room of Nightmare
85562745.text: Each time damage, except Battle Damage, is inflicted to your opponent's Life Points, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. This card's effect is not applied to the effect of "Dark Room of Nightmare".

53982768.name: Dark Ruler Ha Des
53982768.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard. Negate the effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by battle with Fiend-Type monsters you control.

92377303.name: Dark Sage
92377303.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand or Deck) by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician" immediately after applying the effect of "Time Wizard" in which you called the coin toss right. When Special Summoned this way: Add 1 Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

61587183.name: Dark Scorpion - Chick the Yellow
61587183.text:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
Target 1 card on the field; return that target to the hand.
Look at the top card of their Deck, then return it to the top or bottom of the Deck.

6967870.name: Dark Scorpion - Cliff the Trap Remover
6967870.text:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.
Send the top 2 cards of their Deck to the Graveyard.

48768179.name: Dark Scorpion - Gorg the Strong
48768179.text:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
Target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the top of the Deck.
Send the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard.

74153887.name: Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn
74153887.text:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
Add 1 "Dark Scorpion" card from your Deck to your hand.
Target 1 "Dark Scorpion" card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

40933924.name: Dark Scorpion Burglars
40933924.text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: Your opponent sends 1 Spell Card from their Deck to the Graveyard.

20858318.name: Dark Scorpion Combination
20858318.text: You can only activate this card when there are Don Zaloog", "Cliff the Trap Remover", "Dark Scorpion - Chick the Yellow", "Dark Scorpion - Gorg the Strong", and "Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn" face-up on your side of the field. During this turn, any of these 5 cards can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. In that case, the Battle Damage inflicted to your opponent by each of those cards becomes 400 points."

47233801.name: Dark Snake Syndrome
47233801.text: Inflict damage to both players' Life Points during each of your Standby Phases. The first damage begins at 200 points and is doubled during each of your following Standby Phases.

93599951.name: Dark Spirit of the Silent
93599951.text: This card can only be activated during your opponent's Battle Step. Negate the attack of 1 monster and select another 1 of your opponent's face-up monsters and have it attack. If the new targeted attacking monster is in face-up Defense Position change it to Attack Position.

89494469.name: Dark Titan of Terror
89494469.text: A fiend said to dwell in the world of dreams, it attacks enemies in their sleep.

35565537.name: Dark Witch
35565537.text: A popular creature in mythology that delivers fatal attacks with a sharp spear.

59784896.name: Dark Zebra
59784896.text: If this is the only card you control during your Standby Phase, it is automatically placed in Defense Position. You cannot change the position of this card during the same turn.

45895206.name: Dark-Piercing Light
45895206.text: Flip all face-down monsters on your opponent's side of the field face-up.

35798491.name: Darkbishop Archfiend
35798491.text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When an Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1, 3, or 6, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card.

5388481.name: Darkfire Soldier #1
5388481.text: An explosive expert from a special elite force.

78861134.name: Darkfire Soldier #2
78861134.text: A warrior who gained immeasurable power from the heart of a volcano.

57579381.name: Darklord Marie
57579381.text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You gain 200 LP. This card must be in the Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.

80168720.name: Darkness Approaches
80168720.text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. Select 1 face-up monster and flip it face-down, but do not change its battle position.

43500484.name: Darkworld Thorns
43500484.text: A thorny plant found in the darklands that wraps its body around any unwary travelers.

95286165.name: De-Fusion
95286165.text: Select 1 face-up Fusion Monster on the field and return it to the Extra Deck. If all the Fusion Material Monsters that were used for the Fusion Summon of that Fusion Monster are in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon them.

19159413.name: De-Spell
19159413.text: Select 1 Spell Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Spell Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Trap Card, return it to its original position.

69122763.name: Deal of Phantom
69122763.text: Select 1 monster face-up on the field. Increase the selected monster's ATK by 100 points for each monster in your Graveyard during the turn this card is activated. The number of monster is applied when this card is activated.

10209545.name: Decayed Commander
10209545.text: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, you can Special Summon 1 Zombie Tiger" from your hand. If this card successfully attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand."

35027493.name: Deck Devastation Virus
35027493.text: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 2000 or more ATK; check your opponent's hand, all monsters they control, and all cards they draw until the end of their 3rd turn after this card's activation, and destroy all those monsters with 1500 or less ATK.

69542930.name: Dedication through Light and Darkness
69542930.text: You can only activate this card by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician" on your side of the field. Select 1 "Dark Magician of Chaos" from your hand, your Graveyard or your Deck and Special Summon it.

24128274.name: Deepsea Warrior
24128274.text: As long as Umi" is face-up on the field, this card is unaffected by any Spell Cards."

87621407.name: Dekoichi the Battlechanted Locomotive
87621407.text: FLIP: Draw 1 card. For each face-up "Bokoichi the Freightening Car" you control, draw an additional card.

44763025.name: Delinquent Duo
44763025.text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Your opponent randomly selects and discards 1 card from his/her hand and then selects and discards another card from his/her hand.

39719977.name: Delta Attacker
39719977.text: You can only activate this card while there are 3 Normal Monsters of the same name (except Tokens) on your side of the field. The 3 Normal Monsters of the same name can attack your opponent's Life Points directly during the turn this card is activated.

72575145.name: Demotion
72575145.text: Downgrade the monster equipped with this card by 2 Levels.

39131963.name: Des Counterblow
39131963.text: Destroy any monster that inflicts Battle Damage to a player's Life Points by attacking directly.

12965761.name: Des Dendle
12965761.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your Vampire Orchis" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster destroys 1 of your opponent's monsters, Special Summon 1 "Wicked Plant Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/1 Star/ATK 800/DEF 800). (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)"

81985784.name: Des Feral Imp
81985784.text: FLIP: Select 1 card from your Graveyard, add it to your Deck, and shuffle your Deck.

78613627.name: Des Kangaroo
78613627.text: If the ATK of a monster that attacks this monster is lower than the DEF of this card, destroy the attacking monster. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

69579761.name: Des Koala
69579761.text: FLIP: Inflict 400 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each card in your opponent's hand.

2326738.name: Des Lacooda
2326738.text: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned, draw 1 card.

9637706.name: Des Wombat
9637706.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, any damage by a card effect to the controller of this card becomes 0.

93747864.name: Desert Sunlight
93747864.text: All monsters on your side of the field are changed to face-up Defense Position.

13409151.name: Desertapir
13409151.text: FLIP: Flip 1 face-up monster on the field into face-down Defense Position. You cannot select Desertapir"."

71200730.name: Despair from the Dark
71200730.text: When this card is sent from your hand or Deck to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon this card.

72192100.name: Desrook Archfiend
72192100.text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. When a Terrorking Archfiend" on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard to Special Summon the "Terrorking Archfiend"."

94212438.name: Destiny Board
94212438.text: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, place 1 "Spirit Message" card from your hand or your Deck face-up on the field. If it is from your Deck, then shuffle your Deck. When "Spirit Message" cards "I", "N", "A" and "L" are all on your side of the field in their proper order, you are declared the winner. If any of your "Spirit Message" cards or "Destiny Board" are removed from the field, all your "Spirit Message" cards and "Destiny Board" on the field are sent to the Graveyard immediately

73481154.name: Destroyer Golem
73481154.text: A golem with a massive right hand for crushing its victims.

5616412.name: Destruction Punch
5616412.text: When the ATK of an attacking monster on your opponent's side of the field is lower than the DEF of the attacked Defense Position monster on your side of the field, destroy the attacking monster. Damage calculation is applied normally.

21219755.name: Destruction Ring
21219755.text: Destroy 1 face-up monster on your side of the field to inflict 1000 points of damage to both players' Life Points.

96967123.name: Dharma Cannon
96967123.text: A monstrous creature whose body is lined with cannons that never miss their targets.

84257640.name: Dian Keto the Cure Master
84257640.text: Increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

3549275.name: Dice Jar
3549275.text: FLIP: Both players roll a six-sided die once. The player with the lowest result takes damage equal to their opponent's result x 500 Life Points. However, if a winner's result is 6, the loser takes 6000 points of damage. If the results are the same, both players roll again.

83241722.name: Dice Re-Roll
83241722.text: Once this turn, negate 1 six-sided die roll and re-roll it.

11961740.name: Different Dimension Capsule
11961740.text: Select 1 card from your Deck and remove it from play face-down. During your 2nd Standby Phase after activation, destroy this card and add the removed card to your hand.

50939127.name: Different Dimension Dragon
50939127.text: This card cannot be destroyed by the effect of a Spell or Trap Card that does not target it. This card is not destroyed as a result of battle against a monster with an ATK of 1900 or less.

56460688.name: Different Dimension Gate
56460688.text: Target 2 monsters (1 on each side of the field); banish those targets. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Return those banished monsters to the field in the same battle positions they were in.

87880531.name: Diffusion Wave-Motion
87880531.text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Select 1 Level 7 or higher Spellcaster-Type monster on your side of the field. During this turn, only the selected monster can attack and it attacks all monsters on your opponent's side of the field once each. The effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by this attack(s) are not activated.

95194279.name: Dimension Distortion
95194279.text: You can only activate this card if there are no cards in your Graveyard. Select 1 removed from play monster and Special Summon it on your side of the field.

23557835.name: Dimension Fusion
23557835.text: Pay 2000 Life Points. Both players Special Summon as many of their removed from play monsters as possible.

73414375.name: Dimension Jar
73414375.text: FLIP: Both players can remove from play up to 3 monsters from their opponent's Graveyard.

22959079.name: Dimensionhole
22959079.text: Remove 1 monster on your side of the field from play until your next Standby Phase. The card still counts towards the 5-card Monster Zone limit.

24623598.name: Disappear
24623598.text: Remove from play 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard.

20727787.name: Disarmament
20727787.text: Destroy all Equip Cards on the field.

19612721.name: Disc Fighter
19612721.text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster with DEF 2000 or more, destroy the monster with this card's effect without applying Damage Calculation.

76446915.name: Disk Magician
76446915.text: This monster hides in a saucer and only appears when executing an attack.

40826495.name: Dissolverock
40826495.text: A monster born in the lava pits, it generates intense heat that can melt away its enemies.

77561728.name: Disturbance Strategy
77561728.text: Your opponent adds all cards in his/her hand to the Deck and shuffles the Deck. Your opponent then draws the same number of cards that he/she added to the Deck.

62113340.name: Divine Dragon Ragnarok
62113340.text: A legendary dragon sent by the gods as their instrument. Legends say that if provoked, the whole world will sink beneath the sea.

49010598.name: Divine Wrath
49010598.text: When a monster effect is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster.

74701381.name: DNA Surgery
74701381.text: When you activate this card, declare 1 Type of monster. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, all face-up monsters become the Type you declared.

56769674.name: DNA Transplant
56769674.text: Declare 1 Attribute when you activate this card. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the Attribute of all face-up monsters on the field becomes the one you declared.

99721536.name: Dokurorider
99721536.text: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Magic Card, Revival of Dokurorider". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 6 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand."

30325729.name: Dokuroyaiba
30325729.text: A boomerang with brains that will pursue a target to the ends of the earth.

16972957.name: Doma the Angel of Silence
16972957.text: This fairy rules over the end of existence.

3493978.name: Don Turtle
3493978.text: When this card is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned, you can Special Summon any number of Don Turtle"(s) from your hand."

76922029.name: Don Zaloog
76922029.text:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
Discard 1 random card from their hand.
Send the top 2 cards of their Deck to the Graveyard.

67464807.name: Dora of Fate
67464807.text: You can only activate this card during your opponent's turn. Select 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. When you Normal Summon a monster that is 1 Level lower than the selected monster during your next turn, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the Level of the selected monster x 500 points.

23965037.name: Doriado's Blessing
23965037.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Elemental Mistress Doriado". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 3 or more from the field or your hand.

34187685.name: Double Attack
34187685.text: Discard 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Select 1 monster on your side of the field with a lower Level than the discarded monster. The selected monster can attack twice this turn.

44436472.name: Double Coston
44436472.text: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a DARK monster.

3682106.name: Double Snare
3682106.text: Destroy 1 face-up card on the field that has an effect that negates Trap Cards' effects.

24096228.name: Double Spell
24096228.text: Discard 1 Spell Card from your hand. Select 1 Spell Card from your opponent's Graveyard and use it from the Graveyard as your Spell Card.

16435215.name: Dragged Down into the Grave
16435215.text: You and your opponent look at each other's hands, select 1 card from each other's hands and discard them to the Graveyard, and each draw 1 card.

50045299.name: Dragon Capture Jar
50045299.text: Change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Defense Position, also they cannot change their battle positions.

63018132.name: Dragon Manipulator
63018132.text: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the End Phase.

55763552.name: Dragon Piper
55763552.text: FLIP: Destroy all face-up Dragon Capture Jar"(s) on the field. If you destroy any, change all face-up Dragon-Type monsters on the field to Attack Position."

28563545.name: Dragon Seeker
28563545.text: When this card is Summoned (excluding Special Summon), destroy 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster on the field.

1435851.name: Dragon Treasure
1435851.text: A Dragon-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

66672569.name: Dragon Zombie
66672569.text: A dragon revived by sorcery. Its breath is highly corrosive.

55991637.name: Dragon's Gunfire
55991637.text:
You can activate this card only when you have a face-up Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field. Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
Inflict 800 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.
Destroy 1 face-up monster with DEF of 800 or less.

54178050.name: Dragon's Rage
54178050.text: When a Dragon-Type monster on your side of the field attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as battle damage to your opponent's Life Points.

32437102.name: Dragonic Attack
32437102.text: This card can only be used to equip Warrior-Type monsters. The equipped monster is treated as Dragon-Type and increases the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 500 points.

43250041.name: Draining Shield
43250041.text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate that attack, and if you do, gain Life Points equal to that target's ATK.

80193355.name: Dramatic Rescue
80193355.text: You can only activate this card when a card is activated that targets a monster on the field that includes "Amazoness" in this card name, or is named "Amazon Archer". Return the targeted monster to its owner's hand and Special Summon 1 other monster from your hand.

13215230.name: Dream Clown
13215230.text: When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

8687195.name: Dreamsprite
8687195.text: When attacked by your opponent's monster, select another 1 of your Monster Cards and designate it as the attack's target, then calculate damage.

88733579.name: Drill Bug
88733579.text: When this card inflicts damage to your opponent's Life Points, you may take 1 Parasite Paracide" card from your Deck, shuffle the Deck, and place "Parasite Paracide" face-down on top of the Deck."

99050989.name: Drillago
99050989.text: If the only cards on your opponent's side of the field are face-up monsters with ATK 1600 or more, this monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

473469.name: Driving Snow
473469.text: You can activate this card when 1 or more of your Trap Cards are destroyed and sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect your opponent controls. Destroy 1 Magic or Trap Card on the field.

16353197.name: Drooling Lizard
16353197.text: A blood-sucking snake in human form that attacks any living being that passes nearby.

55773067.name: Drop Off
55773067.text: When your opponent draws for their normal draw in their Draw Phase: Your opponent discards 1 card they just drew.

13532663.name: Dummy Golem
13532663.text: FLIP: Your opponent selects 1 monster that he/she controls. Switch control of the selected monster and this card.

31476755.name: Dust Barrier
31476755.text: Face-up Normal Monsters on the field are unaffected by your opponent's Spell Cards. This card is destroyed during your second Standby Phase after activation.

60082869.name: Dust Tornado
60082869.text: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target, then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand.

53693416.name: Eagle Eye
53693416.text: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, no Trap Cards can be activated.

59820352.name: Earth Chant
59820352.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon any EARTH Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from the field or your hand whose total Level equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you are attempting to Ritual Summon.

67105242.name: Earthbound Spirit
67105242.text: A vengeful creature formed by the spirits of fallen warriors, it drags any who dare approach it into the deepest bowels of the earth.

82828051.name: Earthquake
82828051.text: Change all face-up monsters to Defense Position.

60866277.name: Earthshaker
60866277.text: Select 2 Monster Card Attributes. Your opponent then selects 1 of the 2 Attributes and destroys all face-up monsters with that Attribute on the field.

42578427.name: Eatgaboon
42578427.text: If the ATK of a monster summoned by your opponent (excluding Special Summon) is 500 points or less, the monster is destroyed.

97342942.name: Ectoplasmer
97342942.text: Once during each player's End Phase, the turn player Tributes 1 face-up monster on their side of the field and inflicts damage to the opponent equal to half of the original ATK of the Tributed monster.

69954399.name: Ekibyo Drakmord
69954399.text: A monster equipped with this card cannot attack. At the end of the equipped monster's controller's 2nd turn after this card is activated, destroy the equipped monster. At that time, this card is returned to the owner's hand.

55875323.name: Electric Lizard
55875323.text: A non Zombie-Type monster attacking "Electric Lizard" cannot attack on its following turn.

11324436.name: Electric Snake
11324436.text: When this card is discarded from your hand to the Graveyard by an effect of a card controlled by your opponent, draw 2 cards from your Deck.

37820550.name: Electro-Whip
37820550.text: A Thunder-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

90219263.name: Elegant Egotist
90219263.text: If "Harpie Lady" is on the field: Special Summon 1 "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" from your hand or Deck.

23118924.name: Element Doom
23118924.text:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
 EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that is destroyed by this monster as a result of battle.
 WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

30314994.name: Element Dragon
30314994.text:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
 FIRE: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.
 WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

65260293.name: Element Magician
65260293.text:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
 WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.
 WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster as a result of battle, it can attack once again in a row.

92755808.name: Element Saurus
92755808.text:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
 FIRE: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.
 EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that is destroyed by this monster as a result of battle.

66712593.name: Element Soldier
66712593.text:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
 WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.
 EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that is destroyed by this monster in battle.

97623219.name: Element Valkyrie
97623219.text:
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
 FIRE: This card gains 500 ATK.
 WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.

61411502.name: Elemental Burst
61411502.text: Tribute 1 each of WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH monsters on your side of the field to activate this card. Destroy all cards on your opponent's side of the field.

21844576.name: Elemental HERO Avian
21844576.text: A winged Elemental HERO who wheels through the sky and manipulates the wind. His signature move, Featherbreak, gives villainy a blow from sky-high.

58932615.name: Elemental HERO Burstinatrix
58932615.text: A flame manipulator who was the first Elemental HERO woman. Her Burstfire burns away villainy.

84327329.name: Elemental HERO Clayman
84327329.text: An Elemental HERO with a clay body built-to-last. He'll preserve his Elemental HERO colleagues at any cost.

35809262.name: Elemental HERO Flame Wingman
35809262.text:
Elemental HERO Avian + "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

20721928.name: Elemental HERO Sparkman
20721928.text: An Elemental HERO and a warrior of light who proficiently wields many kinds of armaments. His Static Shockwave cuts off the path of villainy.

61204971.name: Elemental HERO Thunder Giant
61204971.text:
Elemental HERO Sparkman + "Elemental HERO Clayman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card to target 1 face-up monster on the field with original ATK less than the ATK of this card; destroy that target.

99414168.name: Elemental Mistress Doriado
99414168.text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Doriado's Blessing". The Attribute of this card is also treated as WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH.

85166216.name: Elephant Statue of Blessing
85166216.text: When this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: You gain 2000 Life Points.

12160911.name: Elephant Statue of Disaster
12160911.text: When this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Inflict 2000 damage to your opponent.

39897277.name: Elf's Light
39897277.text: A Light monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 and decreases its DEF by 200.

6390406.name: Emblem of Dragon Destroyer
6390406.text: Add 1 Buster Blader" from your Deck or your Graveyard to your hand."

53046408.name: Emergency Provisions
53046408.text: Send any number of other Spell and Trap Cards you control to the Graveyard. Gain 1000 Life Points for each card sent.

43580269.name: Emes the Infinity
43580269.text: Each time this card destroys an opponent's monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, increase the ATK of this card by 700 points.

75043725.name: Emissary of the Afterlife
75043725.text: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, each player selects 1 Level 3 or lower Normal Monster from their Deck, and adds it to their hand after showing it to the opponent. The Decks are then shuffled.

6103294.name: Emissary of the Oasis
6103294.text: While a face-up Level 3 or lower Normal Monster is on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target. While this card is face-up on your side of the field, any Battle Damage to the controller of this card from battle involving a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster becomes 0.

58818411.name: Empress Mantis
58818411.text: Queen of an army of giant mantises whose command moves legions.

96355986.name: Enchanted Javelin
96355986.text: Increase your Life Points by the ATK of 1 attacking monster.

30531525.name: Enchanting Fitting Room
30531525.text: Pay 800 Life Points. Pick up 4 cards from the top of your Deck and Special Summon to your side of the field all Level 3 or lower Normal Monsters among the picked-up cards. Return all the other picked-up cards to your Deck and the Deck is then shuffled.

75376965.name: Enchanting Mermaid
75376965.text: A beautiful mermaid that lures voyagers to a watery death.

98045062.name: Enemy Controller
98045062.text:
Active 1 of these effects.
Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.
Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

56916805.name: Energy Drain
56916805.text: Select 1 face-up monster on your side of the field. Increase the ATK and DEF of the monster by an amount equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand x 200 points, until the End Phase.

26022485.name: Enervating Mist
26022485.text: Your opponent's hand size limit becomes 5.

76909279.name: Enraged Battle Ox
76909279.text: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, when Beast, Beast-Warrior and Winged Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field attack with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

91862578.name: Enraged Muka Muka
91862578.text: Increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 400 points for each card in your hand.

74364659.name: Eria the Water Charmer
74364659.text: FLIP: Take control of 1 WATER monster on your opponent's side of the field, for as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

95051344.name: Eternal Rest
95051344.text: Destroy all monsters equipped with Equip Cards.

5556668.name: Exchange
5556668.text: Each player looks at their opponent's hand, chooses 1 card in it and adds it to their own hand.

95451366.name: Exhausting Spell
95451366.text: Remove all Spell Counters on both sides of the field.

26725158.name: Exile of the Wicked
26725158.text: Destroy all face-up Fiend-Type monsters on the field.

74131780.name: Exiled Force
74131780.text: You can Tribute this card to destroy 1 monster on the field.

12600382.name: Exodia Necross
12600382.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Contract with Exodia". This card is not destroyed as a result of battle or by the effects of Spell or Trap Cards, and during each of your Standby Phases, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points. This card is destroyed when any of "Exodia the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One", "Left Arm of the Forbidden One", "Right Leg of the Forbidden One" or "Left Leg of the Forbidden One" is not in your Graveyard.

33396948.name: Exodia the Forbidden One
33396948.text: When you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

21598948.name: Fairy Box
21598948.text: When your opponent's monster declares an attack: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, the attacking monster's ATK becomes 0 until the end of the Battle Phase. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 500 Life Points or destroy this card.

22419772.name: Fairy Guardian
22419772.text: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 Magic Card sent to your Graveyard by your opponent during this turn to the bottom of your Deck.

45425051.name: Fairy King Truesdale
45425051.text: While this card is in Defense Position, all Plant-Type monsters you control gain 500 ATK and DEF.

97687912.name: Fairy Meteor Crush
97687912.text: When a monster equipped with this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

20188127.name: Fairy of the Spring
20188127.text: Add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand. You cannot activate that Equip Spell Card this turn.

68401546.name: Fairy's Gift
68401546.text: This flying monster is known for delivering happiness to all.

17653779.name: Fairy's Hand Mirror
17653779.text: When your opponent activates a Spell Card that targets exactly 1 monster (and no other cards) on the field: Target another card that would be an appropriate target; that Spell now targets the new target.

75582395.name: Faith Bird
75582395.text: This long-tailed bird blinds its enemies with mystical light.

3027001.name: Fake Trap
3027001.text: You can only activate this card when your opponent uses an effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster to destroy Trap Card(s) on your side of the field. Destroy this card as a substitute of those Trap Card(s) and the other Trap Card(s) are not destroyed. If a Set card(s) would have been destroyed, pick up and see the Set card(s).

32919136.name: Falling Down
32919136.text: Destroy this card if there is no Archfiend card on your side of the field. Take control of 1 of your opponent's monsters that is equipped with this card. You take 800 points of damage during each of your opponent's Standby Phases.

89731911.name: Familiar Knight
89731911.text: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, each player can Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from their hand.

77910045.name: Fatal Abacus
77910045.text: Each time 1 monster is sent from the field to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage per card to the respective card owner's Life Points.

34193084.name: Fear from the Dark
34193084.text: When this card is sent from your hand or Deck to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon this card.

37406863.name: Fengsheng Mirror
37406863.text: Look at your opponent's hand. Select and discard 1 Spirit monster to the Graveyard if Spirit monsters exist in his/her hand.

218704.name: Fenrir
218704.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 2 WATER monsters in your Graveyard. When this card destroys an opponent's monster as a result of battle, your opponent skips their next Draw Phase.

41392891.name: Feral Imp
41392891.text: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

78706415.name: Fiber Jar
78706415.text: FLIP: Each player shuffles all cards from their hand, field, and Graveyard into the Deck, then draws 5 cards.

81172176.name: Fiend Comedian
81172176.text: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, all your opponent's cards in the Graveyard are removed from play immediately. If you call it wrong, send a number of cards equal to the cards in your opponent's Graveyard from your Deck to your Graveyard.

2863439.name: Fiend Reflection #2
2863439.text: A bird-beast that summons reinforcements with a hand mirror.

26566878.name: Fiend Scorpion
26566878.text: A huge scorpion inhabited by the soul of a fiend. Usually it holds back, but has untapped potential.

66235877.name: Fiend Skull Dragon
66235877.text: A Fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, negate the effects of Flip-Effect Monsters. Negate the effects of a Trap Card that targets this card and destroy it.

58607704.name: Fiend's Hand Mirror
58607704.text: Switch the opponent's Spell Card effect that targets 1 Spell or Trap Card to another correct target.

52503575.name: Final Attack Orders
52503575.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, all face-up monsters on the field are changed to Attack Position and cannot change their Battle Position.

95308449.name: Final Countdown
95308449.text: Pay 2000 Life Points. After 20 turns have passed (counting the turn you activate this card as the 1st turn), you win the Duel.

18591904.name: Final Destiny
18591904.text: Discard 5 cards from your hand. Destroy all cards on the field.

73134082.name: Final Flame
73134082.text: Inflicts 600 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

60369732.name: Final Ritual of the Ancients
60369732.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Reshef the Dark Being". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

46534755.name: Fire Kraken
46534755.text: A squid that thrives on fire and heat.

64752646.name: Fire Princess
64752646.text: Each time you gain Life Points, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

27132350.name: Fire Sorcerer
27132350.text: FLIP: Randomly select 2 cards from your hand and remove them from play to inflict 800 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

87473172.name: Firebird
87473172.text: Each time a Winged Beast-Type monster(s) on your side of the field is destroyed, this card gains 500 ATK.

53293545.name: Firegrass
53293545.text: A fire-breathing plant found growing near volcanoes.

71407486.name: Fireyarou
71407486.text: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

66788016.name: Fissure
66788016.text: Destroy the 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has the lowest ATK. (If it's a tie, you get to choose.)

60862676.name: Flame Cerberus
60862676.text: Known to many as the "Burning Executioner", this monster is capable of burning enemies to cinders.

42599677.name: Flame Champion
42599677.text: A warrior protected by a flaming shield that nullifies any attack.

12883044.name: Flame Dancer
12883044.text: This monster moves while swinging its burning rope.

34460851.name: Flame Manipulator
34460851.text: This Spellcaster attacks enemies with fire-related spells such as Sea of Flames" and "Wall of Fire"."

41089128.name: Flame Ruler
41089128.text: This card is treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a FIRE monster.

96890582.name: Flash Assailant
96890582.text: Decrease the ATK and DEF of this card by 400 points for every card in your hand.

75560629.name: Flint
75560629.text: A monster equipped with this card cannot change its Battle Position or attack, and has its ATK decreased by 300 points. If the equipped monster is destroyed, select 1 monster on the field and equip this card to that monster.

31987274.name: Flying Fish
31987274.text: Three wishes are granted to those fortunate enough to see this monster in flight.

84834865.name: Flying Kamakiri #1
84834865.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 WIND monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

3134241.name: Flying Kamakiri #2
3134241.text: A flying mantis that feeds primarily on insects.

5628232.name: Flying Penguin
5628232.text: A very rare penguin that takes to the air with ears shaped like wings.

98252586.name: Follow Wind
98252586.text: A Winged Beast-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

97806240.name: Forced Ceasefire
97806240.text: Discard 1 card from your hand. No Trap Cards can be activated until the End Phase of this turn.

74923978.name: Forced Requisition
74923978.text: You can activate this card when you discard from your hand. After that, each time you discard from your hand, your opponent must also discard the same number of cards from his/her hand.

87430998.name: Forest
87430998.text: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior-Type monsters by 200 points.

26931058.name: Formation Union
26931058.text:
Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
Equip 1 Union Monster on your side of the field to an appropriate monster on your side of the field as an Equip Spell Card.
Unequip 1 of your equipped Union Monsters and Special Summon it to your side of the field in face-up Attack Position.

88753985.name: Fox Fire
88753985.text: During the End Phase, if this card was destroyed by battle this turn and was face-up at the start of the Damage Step: Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. This face-up card cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

16556849.name: Freed the Brave Wanderer
16556849.text: Once per turn you can remove from play 2 LIGHT monsters in your Graveyard to destroy 1 face-up monster on the field with higher ATK than this card.

49681811.name: Freed the Matchless General
49681811.text: Negate the effect of any Spell Card that targets this card and destroy it. You can add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck to your hand instead of conducting a normal draw in your Draw Phase.

85359414.name: Freezing Beast
85359414.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Burning Beast" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card on the field. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

98818516.name: Frenzied Panda
98818516.text: A savage beast that carries a big bamboo stick for beating down its enemies.

38742075.name: Frontier Wiseman
38742075.text: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, negate the effects of Spell Cards that target face-up Warrior-Type monsters on your side of the field and destroy the Spell Cards.

46181000.name: Frontline Base
46181000.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can Special Summon 1 Union Monster of Level 4 or lower from your hand.

57069605.name: Frozen Soul
57069605.text: You can only activate this card when your Life Points are at least 2000 lower than your opponent's. Skip your opponent's next Battle Phase.

49998907.name: Fruits of Kozaky's Studies
49998907.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck and return those cards to the top of the Deck in any order.

1781310.name: Fuh-Rin-Ka-Zan
1781310.text:
When there are face-up WIND, WATER, FIRE and EARTH monster(s) on the field: Apply 1 of these effects.
Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.
Discard 2 random cards from your opponent's hand.
Draw 2 cards.

9373534.name: Fuhma Shuriken
9373534.text: You can only equip this card to a monster that includes Ninja" in its card name. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 700 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points."

48206762.name: Fulfillment of the Contract
48206762.text: Pay 800 Life Points. Select 1 Ritual Monster from your Graveyard, Special Summon it to your side of the field and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, remove the equipped monster from play.

38538445.name: Fushi No Tori
38538445.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase your Life Points by an amount equal to the Battle Damage.

39711336.name: Fushioh Richie
39711336.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned from your hand or your Deck by Tributing 1 Great Dezard" that has fulfilled the condition. You can flip this card into face-down Defense Position once per turn during your Main Phase. As long as this monster remains face-up on the field, negate the activation and effects of all Spell and Trap Cards that target this card and destroy them. When this card is flipped face-up, you can Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster from your Graveyard."

51632798.name: Fusilier Dragon, the Dual-Mode Beast
51632798.text: You can Normal Summon or Set this card without Tributing. If you do, its original ATK and DEF are halved.

33550694.name: Fusion Gate
33550694.text: While this card is on the field: Either player can Fusion Summon a Fusion Monster without using "Polymerization", but the Fusion Material Monsters are banished instead of being sent to the Graveyard.

26902560.name: Fusion Sage
26902560.text: Add 1 "Polymerization" card from your Deck to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

37684215.name: Fusion Sword Murasame Blade
37684215.text: You can only equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 800 points. This card cannot be destroyed by effects that destroy Spell Cards.

27967615.name: Fusion Weapon
27967615.text: This card can only be equipped to a Fusion Monster of Level 6 or less. Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 1500 points.

86281779.name: Gadget Soldier
86281779.text: A rust-free machine warrior born to battle.

49003308.name: Gagagigo
49003308.text: This young evildoer used to have an evil heart, but by meeting a special person, he discovered justice.

56594520.name: Gaia Power
56594520.text: Increase the ATK of all EARTH monsters by 500 points and decreases their DEF by 400 points.

51355346.name: Gaia Soul the Combustible Collective

38552107.text: Increase the DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 800 points. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, if you pay 500 Life Points, this card returns to the top of your Deck.

64047146.name: Horn of the Unicorn
64047146.text: The equipped monster gains 700 ATK and DEF. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Return it to the top of the Deck.

75830094.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV4
75830094.text: Control of this card cannot switch. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster by battle, by sending this card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6" from your hand or Deck.

11224103.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6
11224103.text: This card is unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster by battle, you can send this card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8" from your hand or Deck.

48229808.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8
48229808.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6". You can negate the activation and effect of any Spell Cards and destroy them.

9264485.name: Horus' Servant
9264485.text: Your opponent cannot select "Horus the Black Flame Dragon" (of any LV) as the target of the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Monster Card.

67629977.name: Hoshiningen
67629977.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all LIGHT monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all DARK monsters by 400 points.

15083728.name: House of Adhesive Tape
15083728.text: If the DEF of a monster summoned by your opponent (excluding Special Summon) is 500 points or less, the monster is destroyed.

93107608.name: Howling Insect
93107608.text: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type monster with an ATK of 1500 or less to your side of the field from your Deck. Then shuffle your Deck.

65396880.name: Huge Revolution
65396880.text: This card can only be activated during your Main Phase when People Running About," "Oppressed People," and "United Resistance" are face-up on your side of the field. Send all cards in your opponent's hand to the Graveyard and destroy all cards your opponent controls on the field."

30353551.name: Human-Wave Tactics
30353551.text: During the End Phase of each turn, select a number of Level 2 or lower Normal Monsters from your Deck equal to the number of your Level 2 or lower Normal Monsters destroyed as a result of battle during that turn, and Special Summon them to your side of the field. The Deck is then shuffled.

46821314.name: Humanoid Slime
46821314.text: This slime apparently has some human genes in its genetic makeup.

30243636.name: Hungry Burger
30243636.text: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Magic Card, "Hamburger Recipe". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 6 or more as a Tribute form your Field or your hand.

80141480.name: Hunter Spider
80141480.text: This monster feeds on whatever it catches in its web.

22873798.name: Hyena
22873798.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon any number of "Hyenas" from your Deck.

2118022.name: Hyosube
2118022.text: This amphibian is strong on the attack, but leaves much to be desired when defending.

62397231.name: Hyozanryu
62397231.text: A dragon created from a massive diamond that sparkles with blinding light.

2671330.name: Hyper Hammerhead
2671330.text: At the end of the Damage Step, if an opponent's monster that battled this monster is not destroyed: Return that opponent's monster to the hand.

21297224.name: Hysteric Fairy
21297224.text: Tribute 2 monsters on your side of the field to increase your Life Points by 1000 points.

28546905.name: Illusionist Faceless Mage
28546905.text: Manipulates enemy attacks with the power of illusion.

96631852.name: Impenetrable Formation

While you have 2 or more monsters on your side of the field, and all monsters on your side of the field are in Defense Position, increase the DEF of the selected monster by 700 points. When the selected monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

61740673.name: Imperial Order
61740673.text: Negate all Spell effects on the field. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must pay 700 LP (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed.

77084837.name: Inaba White Rabbit
77084837.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. This monster attacks your opponent's Life Points directly.

33031674.name: Incandescent Ordeal
33031674.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon Legendary Flame Lord". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand."

19847532.name: Infernal Flame Emperor
19847532.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, you can remove from play up to 5 FIRE monsters in your Graveyard. Destroy a number of Spell or Trap Cards on the field equal to the number of cards that you remove from play by this effect.

8581705.name: Infernalqueen Archfiend
8581705.text: The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 2 or 5, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, during each Standby Phase, increase the ATK of 1 Archfiend Monster Card by 1000 points until the End Phase.

74823665.name: Inferno
74823665.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 FIRE monster in your Graveyard. When this card destroys an opponent's monster as a result of battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict 1500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

52684508.name: Inferno Fire Blast
52684508.text: Target 1 face-up "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" you control; inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" cannot attack the turn you activate this card.

17185260.name: Inferno Hammer
17185260.text: When this card destroys your opponent's monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, you can select 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field and flip it into face-down Defense Position.

14391920.name: Inferno Tempest
14391920.text: When you take 3000 or more Battle Damage from 1 attack, you can activate this card. Remove all monsters in each player's Deck and Graveyard from play.

94163677.name: Infinite Cards
94163677.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, there is no limit to the number of cards in both player's hands.

54109233.name: Infinite Dismissal
54109233.text: Level 3 or lower monsters are destroyed during the End Phase of the turn that they are Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned.

79575620.name: Injection Fairy Lily
79575620.text: If this card attacks or is attacked, during damage calculation (in either player's turn): You can pay 2000 Life Points once per battle; this card gains 3000 ATK during that damage calculation only.

97923414.name: Inpachi

23615409.name: Insect Barrier

96965364.name: Insect Imitation
96965364.text: Offer 1 monster on your side of the field as a Tribute. Select 1 Insect-Type monster from your Deck that is 1 Level higher than the Tribute monster and Special Summon it on the field in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position. The Deck is then shuffled

35052053.name: Insect Knight

37957847.name: Insect Princess

Each time this card destroys an Insect-Type monster as a result of battle, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.

91512835.name: Insect Queen

During the End-Phase, if this card destroyed an opponent's monster by battle this turn: Special Summon 1 "Insect Monster Token" (Insect-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Attack Position.

7019529.name: Insect Soldiers of the Sky
7019529.text: The ATK of this card increases by 1000 points whenever it attacks a Wind monster.

16227556.name: Inspection

36261276.name: Interdimensional Matter Transporter
36261276.text: Target 1 face-up monster you control; banish that target until the End Phase.

56647086.name: Invader of Darkness
56647086.text: While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent cannot activate Quick-Play Spell Cards.

3056267.name: Invader of the Throne

26082229.name: Invasion of Flames

98374133.name: Invigoration

52675689.name: Invitation to a Dark Sleep

73431236.name: Iron Blacksmith Kotetsu
73431236.text: FLIP: Select 1 Equip Spell Card from your Deck and add it to your hand.

4042268.name: Island Turtle

21770260.name: Jam Breeding Machine

21558682.name: Jam Defender

33784505.name: Jar Robber

14851496.name: Jellyfish

90020065.name: Jigen Bakudan

77585513.name: Jinzo

32809211.name: Jinzo #7

55256016.name: Judgment of Anubis

After that, you can destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field and inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

4869446.name: Judgment of the Desert
4869446.text: The Battle Positions of face-up monsters that are flipped face-up after activation of this card cannot be changed, except with a card effect.

24068492.name: Just Desserts

15401633.name: Kagemusha of the Blue Flame

34627841.name: Kaibaman

52824910.name: Kaiser Glider

17444133.name: Kaiser Sea Horse

97570038.name: Kaminote Blow

95789089.name: Kangaroo Champ

23289281.name: Karate Man

62340868.name: Kazejin

54878498.name: Kelbek

80441106.name: Keldo
80441106.text: When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, select 2 cards from your opponent's Graveyard, add them to your opponent's Deck and the Deck is then shuffled.

88979991.name: Killer Needle
88979991.text: A huge bee with exceptional strength that's particularly dangerous in a swarm.

13756293.name: King Dragun
13756293.text:
Lord of D. + "Divine Dragon Ragnarok"
As long as this card remains face-up on the field, your opponent cannot target Dragon-Type monsters for the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Monster Card. Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand to your side of the field.

84686841.name: King Fog
84686841.text: A fiend that dwells in a blinding curtain of smoke.

36021814.name: King of the Skull Servants

When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, by removing from play 1 other "King of the Skull Servants" or "Skull Servant" card in your Graveyard, Special Summon this card.

79109599.name: King of the Swamp

69455834.name: King of Yamimakai

84814897.name: Kiryu

While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 900 points, and you can Tribute this card to allow the equipped monster to attack your opponent's Life Points directly this turn. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)"

4266839.name: Kiseitai

During each of your opponent's Standby Phases, increase your Life Points by half of the ATK of the monster equipped with this card.

60519422.name: Kishido Spirit
60519422.text: Monsters on your side of the field cannot be destroyed in a battle if the monsters' ATK are equal.

87210505.name: Knight's Title
87210505.text: Activate this card by offering 1 face-up "Dark Magician" on your side of the field as a Tribute. Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician Knight" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

69456283.name: Koitsu

While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 3000 points. When it attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)"

1184620.name: Kojikocy
1184620.text: A man-hunter with powerful arms that can crush boulders

19406822.name: Kotodama

(If a monster is Summoned or flipped face-up that has the same name as a monster that is already face-up on the field, the new face-up monster is destroyed. If they are Summoned or flipped face-up at the same time, they are all destroyed.)

67724379.name: Koumori Dragon
67724379.text: A vicious, fire-breathing dragon whose wicked flame corrupts the souls of its victims.

99171160.name: Kozaky
99171160.text: A workaholic fiend who devotes everything to his research into the languages of Dark World. His mind has collapsed because of working too hard.

21908319.name: Kozaky's Self-Destruct Button
21908319.text: Inflict 1000 points of damage to the Life Points of the player who destroyed this Set card.

82642348.name: Kryuel
82642348.text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

56283725.name: Kumootoko
56283725.text: A massive, intelligent spider that traps enemies with webbing.

85705804.name: Kurama
85705804.text: A vicious bird that attacks from the skies with its whip-like tail.

40640057.name: Kuriboh

60802233.name: Kuwagata Alpha

88240808.name: Kycoo the Ghost Destroyer
88240808.text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: You can target up to 2 monsters in their Graveyard; banish those targets. Your opponent cannot banish cards from either player's Graveyard.

97590747.name: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
97590747.text: A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.

66526672.name: Labyrinth of Nightmare
66526672.text: During the End Phase of each turn, change the Battle Positions of all face-up monsters on the turn player's side of the field.

67284908.name: Labyrinth Wall
67284908.text: These walls form a labyrinth with no exit for enemies.

90147755.name: Lady Assailant of Flames
90147755.text: FLIP: Remove 3 cards from the top of your Deck from play to inflict 800 points of Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

82005435.name: Lady Ninja Yae
82005435.text: By discarding 1 WIND monster from your hand to the Graveyard, return all Spell and Trap Cards on your opponent's side of the field to the owner's hand.

17358176.name: Lady of Faith
17358176.text: Soothes the souls of others by chanting a mysterious spell.

38480590.name: Lady Panther
38480590.text: Offer this face-up card as a Tribute to return 1 of your monsters destroyed in battle during this turn to the top of you Deck.

87756343.name: Larvae Moth

94675535.name: Larvas
94675535.text: A fast-moving, bird-like creature that strangles opposing monsters with its long, thin arms.

77007920.name: Laser Cannon Armor
77007920.text: An Insect-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

28566710.name: Last Turn

Select 1 monster on your side of the field and send all other cards on the field and in their respective owner's hands to their respective Graveyards. After that, your opponent selects and Special Summons 1 monster from his/her Deck in face-up Attack Position and attacks your selected monster. (Any Battle Damage from this battle is treates as 0). The player whose monster reamins along on field at the End Phase of this turn wins the Duel. Any other case results in a DRAW.

85602018.name: Last Will
85602018.text: If a monster on your side of the field was sent to your Graveyard this turn, you can Special Summon 1 monster with an ATK of 1500 points or less from your Deck once during this turn. Then shuffle your Deck.

87322377.name: Launcher Spider
87322377.text: A mechanical spider with rocket launchers capable of random fire.

20394040.name: Lava Battleguard
20394040.text: This card gains 500 ATK for each "Swamp Battleguard" you control.

102380.name: Lava Golem

You cannot Normal Summon/Set the turn you Special Summon this card. During each of the controller's Standby Phases: The controller takes 1000 damage.

7902349.name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One

44519536.name: Left Leg of the Forbidden One
44519536.text: A forbidden left leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

87010442.name: Legacy Hunter

96458440.name: Legendary Black Belt

When the equipped monster destroys your opponent's monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the DEF of the destroyed monster.

60258960.name: Legendary Flame Lord
60258960.text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, Incandescent Ordeal". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 7 or more from the field or your hand. Each time you or your opponent activates 1 Spell Card, put 1 Spell Counter on this card. Remove 3 Spell Counters from this card to destroy all monsters on the field except this card."

25773409.name: Legendary Jujitsu Master
25773409.text: A monster that battles with this Defense Position card is returned to the top of its owner's Deck at the end of the Damage Step.

61854111.name: Legendary Sword

12472242.name: Leghul
12472242.text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

62543393.name: Lekunga
62543393.text: You can banish 2 WATER monsters from your Graveyard: Special Summon 1 "Lekunga Token" (Plant-Type/WATER/Level2/ATK 700/DEF 700) in Attack Position.

10538007.name: Leogun
10538007.text: Huge monster with a lion's mane similar to the King of Beasts.

55444629.name: Lesser Dragon
55444629.text: A minor dragon incapable of breathing fire.

16475472.name: Lesser Fiend

84397023.name: Level Conversion Lab

3136426.name: Level Limit - Area B
3136426.text: All face-up Level 4 or higher monsters on the field are in Defense Position while this card is active.

25290459.name: Level Up!
25290459.text: Send 1 face-up "LV" monster on your side of the field to the Graveyard. Special Summon a monster from your hand or Deck that is written in the card text of the sent monster, ignoring any and all Summoning conditions.

37721209.name: Levia-Dragon - Daedalus
37721209.text: You can send 1 face-up "Umi" you control to the Graveyard; destroy all other cards on the field.

14318794.name: Life Absorbing Machine
14318794.text: During your Standby Phase, gain Life Points equal to half of the total Life Points you paid during your last turn.

62867251.name: Light of Intervention
62867251.text: Monster Cards cannot be Set face-down. Monsters Set in Defense Position are Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position.

44595286.name: Light of Judgment
44595286.text: Activate this card by discarding 1 LIGHT Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard while The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field. Select 1 card on the field controlled by your opponent or 1 card in your opponent's hand (you can look at your opponent's hand), and send it to the Graveyard."

37231841.name: Lighten the Load
37231841.text: Add 1 Level 7 or higher monster from your hand to your Deck and shuffle it, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect once per turn.

49587034.name: Lightforce Sword

55226821.name: Lightning Blade
55226821.text: You can only equip this card to a Warrior-Type monster. Increase the ATK of the equipped monster by 800 points and decrease the ATK of all WATER monsters on the field by 500 points.

27671321.name: Lightning Conger
27671321.text: This massive eel generates huge charges of electricity and unleashes them as thunderbolts.

69162969.name: Lightning Vortex
69162969.text: Discard 1 card. Destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

23171610.name: Limiter Removal
23171610.text: Double the ATK of all Machine-Type monsters you controlled at both the activation and resolution of this card, until the End Phase. During the End Phase, destroy those monsters.

93108297.name: Liquid Beast
93108297.text: A liquid life form that thrives on water.

68658728.name: Little Chimera
68658728.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all FIRE monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all WATER monsters by 400 points.

90790253.name: Little-Winguard
90790253.text: Once per turn, during your End Phase. You can change the battle position of this card.

20831168.name: Lizard Soldier
20831168.text: A beast soldier derived from dragons, it is small for a Dragon-Type. Moving very quickly, this monster is an excellent strategist.

82452993.name: Lone Wolf

17985575.name: Lord of D.
17985575.text: Face-up Dragon-Type monsters cannot be targeted by Spells, Traps, or card effects.

99510761.name: Lord of the Lamp
99510761.text: This spirit emerges from the mystic lamp and obeys the wishes of its summoner.

40320754.name: Lord Poison
40320754.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard, except "Lord Poison"; Special Summon that target.

45871897.name: Lost Guardian
45871897.text: The original DEF of this card equals the number of your banished Rock-Type monsters * 700.

57482479.name: Luminous Soldier
57482479.text: If this card battles with a DARK monster, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points during the Damage Step.

81777047.name: Luminous Spark
81777047.text: Increase the ATK of all LIGHT monsters by 500 and decreases their DEF by 400 points.

11091375.name: Luster Dragon
