17658803.name: Luster Dragon #2
17658803.text: This dragon feeds on emerald. Enchanted by this monster even when attacked, few people live to tell of its beauty.

56342351.name: M-Warrior #1
56342351.text: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior uses magnetism to block an enemy's escape.

92731455.name: M-Warrior #2
92731455.text: Specializing in combination attacks, this warrior is equipped with a tough, magnetically coated armor.

25769732.name: Machine Conversion Factory
25769732.text: A Machine-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

63995093.name: Machine Duplication
63995093.text: Select 1 face-up Machine-Type monster you control with 500 or less ATK. You can Special Summon up to 2 cards with the same name from your Deck.

46700124.name: Machine King
46700124.text: Increase the ATK of this card by 100 points for each face-up Machine-Type monster on the field.

79182538.name: Mad Dog of Darkness
79182538.text: He used to be a normal dog who played around in a park, but was corrupted by the powers of darkness.

79870141.name: Mad Sword Beast
79870141.text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

83746708.name: Mage Power

62279055.name: Magic Cylinder

59344077.name: Magic Drain
59344077.text: When your opponent activates a Spell Card: Negate the activation and destroy it. Your opponent can discard 1 Spell Card to negate this card's effect.

77414722.name: Magic Jammer
77414722.text: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

61844784.name: Magic Reflector
61844784.text: Select 1 Spell Card that remains face-up on your side of the field and put 1 counter on it. If the selected card is destroyed, the counter is removed instead of the card being destroyed.

46474915.name: Magical Ghost

81210420.name: Magical Hats
81210420.text: Activate only during your opponent's Battle Phase. Select 2 non-Monster Cards from your Deck and 1 monster you control. Shuffle those 3 cards and Set them on the field in face-down Defense Position. The 2 cards selected from your Deck are treated as monsters (ATK 0/DEF 0) and are destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase.

64389297.name: Magical Labyrinth

8034697.name: Magical Marionette

32362575.name: Magical Merchant
32362575.text: FLIP: Pick up cards from the top of your Deck until you pick up a Spell Card or Trap Card. Add that card to your hand. Send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

7802006.name: Magical Plant Mandragola
7802006.text: FLIP: Place 1 Spell Counter on each face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on.

34206604.name: Magical Scientist
34206604.text: Pay 1000 Life Points to Special Summon 1 level 6 or lower Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck in face-up Attack or Defense Position. That Fusion Monster cannot attack your opponent's Life Points directly, and is returned to your Extra Deck at the end of the turn.

53119267.name: Magical Thorn
53119267.text: When your opponent's card(s) are discarded to the Graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage to his/her Life Points for each card that was discarded.

31560081.name: Magician of Faith
31560081.text: FLIP: Add 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

93013676.name: Maha Vailo
93013676.text: This card gains 500 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to this card.

40695128.name: Maharaghi

If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, look at 1 card on the top of your Deck during your next Draw Phase (before you draw), and return the card to the top or the bottom of your Deck.

17214465.name: Maiden of the Aqua
17214465.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the field is treated as Umi" (however there is no increasing or decreasing of ATK/DEF due to "Umi"'s effect). If there is an active Field Spell Card on the field, this effect is not applied."

79629370.name: Maiden of the Moonlight
79629370.text: A sorcerer blessed by lunar light with powers far beyond mortal comprehension.

60102563.name: Maji-Gire Panda
60102563.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, each time a Beast-Type monster(s) on the field is destroyed, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.

9074847.name: Major Riot

Both you and your opponent can then Special Summon from your hand the same number of Monster Cards on the field in face-down Defense Position.

8794435.name: Maju Garzett

99597615.name: Malevolent Nuzzler

13626450.name: Malice Dispersion

72657739.name: Malice Doll of Demise

40374923.name: Mammoth Graveyard

93553943.name: Man Eater
93553943.text: Man-eating plant with poison feelers for attacking enemies.

54652250.name: Man-Eater Bug

43714890.name: Man-Thro' Tro'

38369349.name: Manga Ryu-Ran

You can Special Summon this card from your hand (but Tributes are required if it is Level 5 or higher). This card cannot attack during the turn it is Summoned. This card cannot attack unless you pay 500 Life Points. When "Toon World" is destroyed, destroy this card. If your opponent doesn't control a Toon Monster, this card can attack your opponent directly. If your opponent controls a face-up Toon Monster, you must select it as an attack target.

95492061.name: Manju of the Ten Thousand Hands
95492061.text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Monster Card or 1 Ritual Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

77121851.name: Manticore of Darkness

2460565.name: Marauding Captain

28933734.name: Mask of Darkness

20765952.name: Mask of Dispel

56948373.name: Mask of the Accursed

57882509.name: Mask of Weakness

39191307.name: Masked Dragon

10189126.name: Masked Sorcerer

75499502.name: Master & Expert

49814180.name: Master Monk

If "Pandemonium" is on your side of the field when you Special Summon this card, your opponent discards 3 random cards from their hand. If "Pandemonium" is not on your side of the field, this effect is not applied.

94667532.name: Mecha-Dog Marron

When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard except as a result of battle, inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

34442949.name: Mechanical Snail

7359741.name: Mechanicalchaser

76211194.name: Meda Bat

2694423.name: Medusa Worm

46820049.name: Mefist the Infernal General

21817254.name: Mega Thunderball

32062913.name: Mega Ton Magical Cannon

22046459.name: Megamorph

71544954.name: Megarock Dragon

The original ATK and DEF of this card become the number of Rock-Type monsters you removed from play when you Special Summoned this card x 700 points.

7562372.name: Megasonic Eye

86569121.name: Melchid the Four-Face Beast

24435369.name: Mermaid Knight

44656491.name: Messenger of Peace

65957473.name: Metal Armored Bug

75646520.name: Metal Detector

55998462.name: Metal Fish

7369217.name: Metallizing Parasite - Lunatite

(1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the monster that this card is equipped to is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

68540059.name: Metalmorph

33114323.name: Metalsilver Armor

50705071.name: Metalzoa

46411259.name: Metamorphosis

33767325.name: Meteor of Destruction
33767325.text: If your opponent's Life Points are higer than 300: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

64274292.name: Meteorain

37580756.name: Michizure
37580756.text: You can activate this card when your monster is sent from the field to the Graveyard. Destroy 1 monster on the field.

18190572.name: Micro Ray

75487237.name: Mid Shield Gardna

62327910.name: Mighty Guard
62327910.text: A machine soldier that was developed as a guard. It is made of rust-proof metal.

38277918.name: Mikazukinoyaiba
38277918.text: A dragon warrior of the moon armed with a crescent sword.

82482194.name: Millennium Scorpion
82482194.text: Each time this card destroys 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, increase the ATK of this card by 500 points.

32012841.name: Millennium Shield
32012841.text: A Millennium item, it's rumored to block any strong attack.

7489323.name: Milus Radiant
7489323.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all EARTH monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all WIND monsters by 400 points.

32539892.name: Minar

37520316.name: Mind Control

15800838.name: Mind Crush
15800838.text: Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard all copies of it, otherwise you discard 1 random card.

75392615.name: Mind Haxorz
75392615.text: Pay 500 Life Points. Look at your opponent's hand and all Set cards on his/her side of the field.

66690411.name: Mind on Air
66690411.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, your opponent must continue to show his/her hand.

52817046.name: Mind Wipe
52817046.text: You can only activate this card if your opponent has 3 or less cards in his/her hand. Your opponent adds his/her hand to the Deck and shuffles it, then draws the same of number of cards he/she added to the Deck.

76321376.name: Mine Golem
76321376.text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

85519211.name: Minefield Eruption
85519211.text: Inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each face-up "Mine Golem" on your side of the field. After that, destroy all face-up "Mine Golem"(s) on your side of the field.

1918087.name: Minor Goblin Official

6343408.name: Miracle Dig
6343408.text: If 5 or more of your monsters are currently removed from play, return 3 of them to the Graveyard.

68334074.name: Miracle Restoring
68334074.text: Remove 2 Spell Counters on your side of the field. Special Summon 1 Dark Magician" or "Buster Blader" from your Graveyard in face-up Attack or Defense Position."

15960641.name: Mirage Dragon
15960641.text: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

49217579.name: Mirage Knight
49217579.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by the effect of "Dark Flare Knight". When this card battles another monster, during damage calculation increase the ATK of this card by the original ATK of the opponent's monster. During the End Phase after this card was involved in battle, remove this card from play.

41482598.name: Mirage of Nightmare
41482598.text: Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase: Draw until you have 4 cards in your hand. If you do, once during your next Standby Phase after that: Randomly discard the same number of cards you drew (or your entire hand, if you do not have enough cards).

44095762.name: Mirror Force
44095762.text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

22359980.name: Mirror Wall
22359980.text: Each of your opponent's monsters that conducted an attack while this card was face-up on the field has its ATK halved as long as this card remains on the field. During each of your Standby Phases, pay 2000 Life Points or destroy this card.

33178416.name: Misairuzame
33178416.text: A missile-launching fish protected by deadly spikes.

58392024.name: Mispolymerization
58392024.text: You can only activate this card when a Fusion Monster is Special Summoned. Return all face-up Fusion Monsters on the field to their respective Fusion Decks.

45159319.name: Moai Interceptor Cannons
45159319.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position.

4929256.name: Mobius the Frost Monarch

75285069.name: Moisture Creature

27288416.name: Mokey Mokey

13803864.name: Mokey Mokey King
13803864.text:
Mokey Mokey + "Mokey Mokey" + "Mokey Mokey"
When this card is removed from the field, you can Special Summon as many "Mokey Mokey" as possible from your Graveyard.

1965724.name: Mokey Mokey Smackdown
1965724.text: While a face-up "Mokey Mokey" is on your side of the field, if a Fairy-Type monster on your side of the field is destroyed, the ATK of all "Mokey Mokey" on your side of the field becomes 3000 until the End Phase of this turn.

17192817.name: Molten Behemoth
17192817.text: A giant born from magma, it attacks with a magma punch.

19384334.name: Molten Destruction
19384334.text: Increase the ATK of all FIRE monsters by 500 and decreases their DEF by 400 points.

4732017.name: Molten Zombie
4732017.text: When this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard, the controller of this card draws 1 card.

3810071.name: Monk Fighter
3810071.text: Battle Damage to this card's controller that he/she takes from a battle involving this card becomes 0.

36121917.name: Monster Egg

43040603.name: Monster Gate

83764718.name: Monster Reborn

74848038.name: Monster Reincarnation
74848038.text: Discard 1 card to select 1 Monster Card in your Graveyard, and add it to your hand.

93671934.name: Morale Boost
93671934.text: Each time a player equips an Equip Spell Card, increase the Life Points of the controller of that Equip Spell Card by 1000 points. Each time an Equip Spell Card is removed from the field, the controller of that Equip Spell Card takes 1000 points of damage.

55784832.name: Morinphen
55784832.text: A strange fiend with long arms and razor sharp talons.

31305911.name: Marshmallon
31305911.text: Cannot be destroyed by battle. After damage calculation, if this card was attacked, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: The attacking player takes 1000 damage.

79106360.name: Morphing Jar #2

Then, each player reveals cards from the top of their Deck, until they reveal the same number of monsters they shuffled into their Main Deck. Special Summon all revealed Level 4 or lower monsters in face-down Defense Position, also send any remaining cards to the Graveyard.

57839750.name: Mother Grizzly
57839750.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 WATER monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

50913601.name: Mountain
50913601.text: Increases the ATK and DEF of all Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder-Type monsters by 200 points.

31477025.name: Mr. Volcano
31477025.text: This seemingly mild-mannered creature has an extremely volatile temper.

70307656.name: Mucus Yolk
70307656.text: This card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly. Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during your next Standby Phase. The ATK increase lasts as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

82108372.name: Mudora
82108372.text: This card gains 200 ATK for every Fairy-Type monster in your Graveyard.

46657337.name: Muka Muka
46657337.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 300 points for every card in the controller's hand.

80863132.name: Muko
80863132.text: You can only activate this card when an effect of drawing card(s) is activated. Both players see the cards drawn by the effect and discard them all to the Graveyard.

22493811.name: Multiplication of Ants
22493811.text: Tribute 1 Insect-Type Monster on your side of the field. Special Summon 2 "Army Ant Tokens" (Insect-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 500/DEF 1200) on your side of the field. The tokens cannot be used as a Tribute for a Tribute Summon.

93900406.name: Mushroom Man #2
93900406.text: A player controlling this monster loses 300 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases when this card is on the Field. Control of this card is shifted to your opponent by paying 500 Life Points at your End Phase.

56907389.name: Musician King
56907389.text: Witch of the Black Forest + "Lady of Faith"

68191243.name: Mustering of the Dark Scorpions
68191243.text: If you control a face-up "Don Zaloog": You can Special Summon any number of "Dark Scorpion" monsters from your hand, but only 1 copy of each.

69279219.name: My Body as a Shield
69279219.text: Activate only by paying 1500 Life Points when your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or Effect Monster's effect that would destroy a monster(s) on the field. Negate the activation of that card and destroy it.

1347977.name: Mysterious Guard
1347977.text: FLIP: Return 1 face-up monster on the field to the top of its owner's Deck. Also, if there is a face-up Warrior-Type monster on your side of the field, you can return another face-up monster to its owner's hand.

54098121.name: Mysterious Puppeteer
54098121.text: Each time you or your opponent Normal Summons or Flip Summons a monster, increase your Life Points by 500 points.

47060154.name: Mystic Clown
47060154.text: Nothing can stop the mad attack of this powerful creature.

68516705.name: Mystic Horseman
68516705.text: Half man and half horse, this monster is known for its extreme speed.

98049915.name: Mystic Lamp
98049915.text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

18161786.name: Mystic Plasma Zone
18161786.text: Increase the ATK of all DARK monsters by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

49251811.name: Mystic Probe
49251811.text: You can activate this card when a Continuous Magic Card is activated. Negate all Continuous Magic Cards during the turn this card is activated.

47507260.name: Mystic Swordsman LV2
47507260.text: If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster by battle, by sending this card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV4" from your hand or Deck.

74591968.name: Mystic Swordsman LV4
74591968.text: If you Normal Summon this card, you must place it in face-down Defense Position. If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. During the End Phase of a turn that this card destroyed a monster by battle, by sending this card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV6" from your hand or Deck.

60482781.name: Mystic Swordsman LV6
60482781.text: If you Normal Summon this card, you must place it in face-down Defense Position. If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. You can return the monster destroyed with this effect to the top of its owner's Deck, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

83011278.name: Mystic Tomato
83011278.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 DARK monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

15025844.name: Mystical Elf
15025844.text: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

98745000.name: Mystical Knight of Jackal
98745000.text: When this card destroys 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field and sends it to your opponent's Graveyard as a result of battle, you can then return the card to the top of your opponent's Deck.

36607978.name: Mystical Moon
36607978.text: A Beast-Warrior-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

30451366.name: Mystical Sheep #1
30451366.text: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion-Material Monster. When you do this, the other Fusion-Material Monster(s) must be the correct one(s).

83464209.name: Mystical Sheep #2
83464209.text: A monstrous sheep with a long tail for hypnotizing enemies.

39552864.name: Mystical Shine Ball
39552864.text: A soul of light covered by mystical shine. When you see its beautiful shape, your dream will come true.

5318639.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
5318639.text: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.

80161395.name: Mystik Wok
80161395.text: Tribute 1 monster. Select either its ATK or DEF and gain that many Life Points.

40172183.name: Narrow Pass
40172183.text: This card can only be activated when both players have 2 monsters or less on their respective sides of the field. Both players can only Normal Summon up to 2 additional monsters on their sides of the field.

48576971.name: Necklace of Command
48576971.text:
When a monster you control that's equipped with this card is destroyed by battle, and this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can either:Draw 1 card. OR
Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

47355498.name: Necrovalley
47355498.text: All "Gravekeeper's" monsters gain 500 ATK and DEF. Cards in either player's Graveyard cannot be banished. Negate any card effect that would move a card in the Graveyard, other than itself, to a different place.

98162242.name: Needle Burrower
98162242.text: When this card destroys a monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the Level of the destroyed monster x 500 points.

38411870.name: Needle Ceiling
38411870.text: Activate only when there are 4 or more monsters on the field. Destroy all face-up monsters.

38299233.name: Needle Wall
38299233.text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Roll a six-sided die. Treat your opponent's Monster Card Zones as numbers 1-5, counting from your right, and destroy the monster that is in the same Monster Card Zone as the result. If the result is 6, roll again.

81843628.name: Needle Worm
81843628.text: FLIP: Discard 5 cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

14315573.name: Negate Attack
14315573.text: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares an attack. Negate the attack of that 1 monster and end the Battle Phase.

11021521.name: Neko Mane King
11021521.text: During your opponent's turn, when this card in your possession is sent to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: It becomes the End Phase of this turn.

1761063.name: Nekogal #1
1761063.text: A pussycat-fairy. Contrary to her lovely beauty, she claws on her enemies.

90963488.name: Nemuriko
90963488.text: A child-like creature that controls a sleep fiend to beckon enemies into eternal slumber.

49563947.name: Neo Aqua Madoor
49563947.text: The true nature of this wizard, who rules all water. It defends itself with a vast, impenetrable wall of ice.

16587243.name: Neo Bug
16587243.text: A huge bug-like monster said to come from another planet. It gathers in swarms.

50930991.name: Neo the Magic Swordsman
50930991.text: A dimensional drifter who not only practices sorcery, but is also a sword and martial arts master.

4335645.name: Newdoria
4335645.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

16226786.name: Night Assailant

59290628.name: Nightmare Horse

81306586.name: Nightmare Penguin
81306586.text: When this card is flipped face-up, select 1 card your opponent controls, and return it to the hand. All face-up WATER monsters you control gain 200 ATK.

54704216.name: Nightmare Wheel

22567609.name: Nimble Momonga
22567609.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, gain 1000 Life Points. You can also Special Summon any number of "Nimble Momongas" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

11987744.name: Nin-Ken Dog

4041838.name: Ninja Grandmaster Sasuke
4041838.text: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-up Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster.

89628781.name: Ninjitsu Art of Decoy
89628781.text: Target 1 face-up "Ninja" monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle.

70861343.name: Ninjitsu Art of Transformation
70861343.text: Tribute 1 face-up "Ninja" monster you control; Special Summon 1 Beast, Winged Beast, or Insect-Type monster with a Level less than or equal to the Level of the Tributed card + 3 from your hand or Deck. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster.

23842445.name: Nitro Unit
23842445.text: You can only equip this card to a monster on your opponent's side of the field. When a monster destroys the equipped monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the ATK of the equipped monster.

7805359.name: Niwatori
7805359.text: Swallows enemies whole and uses their essence as energy.

71044499.name: Nobleman of Crossout
71044499.text: Destroy 1 face-down monster and remove it from play. If the monster is a Flip Effect Monster, both players must remove from play all monsters from their Decks with the same name as the destroyed monster.

17449108.name: Nobleman of Extermination
17449108.text: Destroy 1 face-down Magic or Trap Card and remove it from play. If the card is a Trap Card, both players must remove all Trap Cards of the same name from their respective Decks and remove them from play. The Decks are then shuffled.

65878864.name: Nobleman-Eater Bug
65878864.text: FLIP: Destroy 2 monsters on the field.

76848240.name: Non Aggression Area
76848240.text: You can only activate this card during your Standby Phase. Discard 1 card from your hand. Your opponent cannot Normal Summon, Set and/or Special Summon during his/her next turn.

20065549.name: Non-Spellcasting Area
20065549.text: All face-up Monster Cards, except for Effect Monsters, are unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards (other than this card).

43694075.name: Novox's Prayer
43694075.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon Skull Guardian". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 7 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand."

51616747.name: Nubian Guard
51616747.text: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, you can return 1 Continuous Spell Card from your Graveyard to the top of your Deck.

2130625.name: Numinous Healer
2130625.text: You can activate this card when you take damage to your Life Points. Increase your Life Points by 1000 points. In addition, increase your Life Points by 500 points per card if there are additional Numinous Healer" cards in the Graveyard."

29389368.name: Nutrient Z
29389368.text: This card can only be activated during your opponent's Damage Step. During this turn, if you take Battle Damage of 2000 points or more, increase your Life Points by 4000 points before the damage is subtracted from your Life Points.

12953226.name: Nuvia the Wicked

52077741.name: Obnoxious Celtic Guardian

10485110.name: Ocean Dragon Lord - Neo-Daedalus
10485110.text: Send Umi" on your side of the field to the Graveyard to send all cards in both players' hands and on the field to the Graveyard, except this card."

74637266.name: Octoberser
74637266.text: With the head of a fish and the legs of an octopus, this strange creature attacks enemies by flinging spears.

86088138.name: Ocubeam
86088138.text: Frightening in appearance, this creature uses its large eyes and ears to keep track of any movement.

19230408.name: Offerings to the Doomed
19230408.text: Destroy 1 face-up monster. Skip your next Draw Phase.

45121025.name: Ogre of the Black Shadow
45121025.text: An ogre possessed by the powers of the dark. Few can withstand its rapid charge.

79335209.name: Ojama Black
79335209.text: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

8251996.name: Ojama Delta Hurricane!!
8251996.text: You can only activate this card while "Ojama Green", "Ojama Yellow" and "Ojama Black" are face-up on your side of the field. Destroy all cards on your opponent's side of the field.

12482652.name: Ojama Green
12482652.text: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

90140980.name: Ojama King
90140980.text:
Ojama Green + "Ojama Yellow" + "Ojama Black"
Select up to 3 of your opponent's Monster Card Zones. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the selected zones cannot be used.

29843091.name: Ojama Trio
29843091.text: Special Summon 3 "Ojama Tokens" (Beast-Type/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 1000) in Defense Position on your opponent's side of the field. The tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon. When an "Ojama Token" is destroyed, the controller of that token takes 300 points of damage.

42941100.name: Ojama Yellow
42941100.text: He's one of the Ojama Trio. It's said that he butts in by any means necessary. It's also said that when the three are together, something happens.

45141844.name: Old Vindictive Magician
45141844.text: FLIP: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

56995655.name: Ominous Fortunetelling
56995655.text: During your Standby Phase, select 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Call the type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap). If you call it right, inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. You can use this effect only once per turn.

33064647.name: One-Eyed Shield Dragon
33064647.text: This dragon wears a shield not only for its own protection, but also for ramming its enemies.

66927994.name: Oni Tank T-34
66927994.text: An armored tank possessed by a fiend that will pursue enemies until they're crushed.

58861941.name: Ooguchi
58861941.text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

58538870.name: Oppressed People
58538870.text: They are oppressed, but believe they will have their freedom someday.

44762290.name: Opti-Camouflage Armor
44762290.text: You can only equip this card to a Level 1 monster. A monster equipped with this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

14531242.name: Opticlops
14531242.text: A one-eyed giant that serves the "Dark Ruler Ha Des", it skewers its enemies with its sharp horn, shattering them to pieces.

63120904.name: Orca Mega-Fortress of Darkness
63120904.text: By Tributing 1 Torpedo Fish" on your side of the field, destroy 1 monster on the field. By Tributing 1 "Cannonball Spear Shellfish" on your side of the field, destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field."

39537362.name: Ordeal of a Traveler
39537362.text: You can activate this card's effect when your opponent declares an attack. Your opponent selects 1 random card in your hand and calls the type of the card (Monster, Spell, or Trap). If your opponent calls it wrong, the attacking monster is returned to its owner's hand.

78986941.name: Order to Charge
78986941.text: Select 1 face-up Normal Monster (except a Token) on your side of the field when you activate this card. When this card resolves, Tribute the selected Normal Monster and destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

39019325.name: Order to Smash
39019325.text: Select 1 face-up Level 2 or lower Normal Monster (except a Token) on your side of the field when you activate this card. When this card resolves, you can Tribute the selected Normal Monster and destroy 1 or 2 Spell or Trap Cards on your opponent's side of the field.

82065276.name: Oscillo Hero
82065276.text: A strange warrior from another dimension.

39751094.name: Otohime
39751094.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up, you can change the battle position of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field.

11548522.name: Outstanding Dog Marron
11548522.text: When this card is sent to your Graveyard, add it to your Deck and shuffle it.

2311603.name: Overdrive
2311603.text: An all-terrain armored vehicle armed with a heavy-duty machine gun.

74191942.name: Painful Choice
74191942.text: Select 5 cards from your Deck and show them to your opponent. Your opponent selects 1 card among them. Add that card to your hand and discard the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

73398797.name: Paladin of White Dragon

If this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, destroy the monster immediately with this card's effect without flipping it face-up or applying damage calculation. You can Tribute this card to Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand or your Deck. ("Blue-Eyes White Dragon" cannot attack during that turn.)

21263083.name: Pale Beast
21263083.text: With skin tinged bluish-white, this strange creature is a fearsome sight to behold.

94585852.name: Pandemonium
94585852.text: Neither player has to pay Life Points during the Standby Phase for "Archfiend" monsters. Each time a player's "Archfiend" monster(s) is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, except by battle, that player can add 1 "Archfiend" monster from their Deck to their hand that is a lower Level than the destroyed card.

75375465.name: Pandemonium Watchbear
75375465.text: As long as this card remains face-up on your side of the field, Pandemonium" on your side of the field is not destroyed by your opponent's card effects."

50152549.name: Paralyzing Potion
50152549.text: A non Machine-Type monster equipped with this card cannot attack.

27911549.name: Parasite Paracide
27911549.text: Flip: Put this card face-up in your opponent's Deck and shuffle it. When your opponent draws this card, it is Special Summoned on your opponent's side of the field in face-up Defense Position and inflicts 1000 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. Then all face-up monsters on your opponent's side of the field become Insect-Type as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

62762898.name: Parrot Dragon
62762898.text: A dragon from the cartoons that's more dangerous than it appears to be.

19153634.name: Patrician of Darkness
19153634.text: You choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks.

76775123.name: Patrol Robo
76775123.text: During your Standby Phase, look at on of your opponent's face-down cards on the field.

20624263.name: Peacock
20624263.text: A large peacock that launches its feathers in a lethal attack.

967928.name: Penalty Game!
967928.text:
When your opponent has 4 cards in their hand, select and activate 1 of these effects:Your opponent cannot draw during their next Draw Phase.
Your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards this turn.

36039163.name: Penguin Knight
36039163.text: When this card is sent directly from your Deck to the Graveyard by an opponent's card effect, combine your Graveyard cards with your own Deck, shuffle them and form a new Deck.

93920745.name: Penguin Soldier
93920745.text: FLIP: You can target up to 2 monsters on the field; return those targets to the hand.

64751286.name: Penumbral Soldier Lady
64751286.text: If this card battles with a LIGHT monster, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during the Damage Step.

12143771.name: People Running About
12143771.text: Although they always suffer in silence, they swear an oath to inevitably revolt.

18891691.name: Perfect Machine King
18891691.text: Increase the ATK of this card by 500 points for each Machine-Type monster on the field other than this card.

48579379.name: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth
48579379.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Petit Moth" on your 6th turn or later after it was equipped with "Cocoon of Evolution".

4849037.name: Performance of Sword
4849037.text: This monster can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Magic Card, "Commencement Dance". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 6 or more as a Tribute form your Field or your hand.

52624755.name: Peten the Dark Clown
52624755.text: When this card is sent to your Graveyard, you can remove this card from the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Peten the Dark Clown" from your hand or Deck.

38142739.name: Petit Angel
38142739.text: A quick-moving and tiny fairy that's very difficult to hit.

75356564.name: Petit Dragon
75356564.text: A very small dragon known for its vicious attacks.

58192742.name: Petit Moth
58192742.text: This small but deadly creature is better off avoided.

52550973.name: Pharaoh's Servant
52550973.text: An apparition of those said to formerly serve the Pharaoh. It has tremendous loyalty that does not waiver.

63571750.name: Pharaoh's Treasure
63571750.text: After activation, put this card face-up in your Deck and shuffle it. When you draw this card, send it to the Graveyard and add 1 card in your Graveyard (except this card) to your hand.

89959682.name: Pharaonic Protector
89959682.text: The mummy of a soldier that has been guarding the royal family for thousands of years. Even now, its spirit does not allow anybody to trespass.

63356631.name: Phoenix Wing Wind Blast
63356631.text: Discard 1 card to target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the top of the Deck.

63442604.name: Physical Double
63442604.text: During your opponent's turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 "Mirage Token" with the same Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, and DEF as that target. Destroy this Token during the End Phase.

74270067.name: Pikeru's Circle of Enchantment
74270067.text: Damage to you from card effects becomes 0 until the end of this turn.

58015506.name: Pikeru's Second Sight
58015506.text: Until your opponent's second End Phase, your opponent shows you all cards that he/she draws and then add them to his/her hand.

26185991.name: Pinch Hopper
26185991.text: When this card on your side of the field is sent to your Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type Monster from your hand.

90669991.name: Pineapple Blast
90669991.text: You can only activate this card when you Normal Summon a monster successfully. If there are more monsters on your opponent's side of the field than your side, destroy your opponent's monsters so that your opponent controls the same number of monsters as you. Your opponent selects which monsters are destroyed.

50823978.name: Piranha Army
50823978.text: The Battle Damage this card inflicts by attacking your opponent's Life Points directly is doubled.

34029630.name: Pitch-Black Power Stone
34029630.text: After activation, place 3 Spell Counters on this card. During each of your turns you can move 1 Spell Counters from this card to another face-up card that you can place a Spell Counter on. When there are no Spell Counters on this card, destroy it. (Deck contains 2 of this card)

88975532.name: Pitch-Black Warwolf
88975532.text: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

47415292.name: Pitch-Dark Dragon
47415292.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your Dark Blade" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 400 points. When it attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)"

35429292.name: Pixie Knight
35429292.text: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, your opponent selects 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard, and places that card on the top of your Deck.

76539047.name: Poison Fangs
76539047.text: Each time a Beast-Type monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

43716289.name: Poison Mummy
43716289.text: FLIP: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

8842266.name: Poison of the Old Man
8842266.text:
Activate 1 of these effects:
Gain 1200 Life Points.
Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

73578229.name: Pole Position
73578229.text: The face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field is unaffected by any Spell Cards. When "Pole Position" is removed from the field, destroy the face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field.

24094653.name: Polymerization
24094653.text: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials.

52860176.name: Possessed Dark Soul
52860176.text: Tribute this face-up monster. Take control of all face-up Level 3 or lower monsters your opponent controls until they are removed from the field.

77027445.name: Power of Kaishin
77027445.text: A Aqua-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

68304813.name: Precious Cards from Beyond
68304813.text: When you successfully Tribute Summon or Set a monster that required 2 or more Tributes, draw 2 cards from your Deck.

70828912.name: Premature Burial
70828912.text: Activate this card by paying 800 Life Points, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Attack Position and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

549481.name: Prevent Rat
549481.text: This creature is shielded with a tough hide of hair and is excellent at defending itself.

91559748.name: Prickle Fairy
91559748.text: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, your opponent cannot attack Insect-Type monsters. The battle position of a monster that battles with this card is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

23701465.name: Primal Seed
23701465.text: If "Black Luster Soldier - Envoy of the Beginning" or "Chaos Emperor Dragon - Envoy of the End" is on the field: Target 2 of your banished cards; add both those targets to your hand.

51371017.name: Princess of Tsurugi
51371017.text: FLIP: Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each Spell and Trap Card on your opponent's side of the field.

43711255.name: Prohibition
43711255.text: Activate by declaring 1 card name. Cards with that name, and their effects, cannot be used. Cards already on the field are not affected (including face-down cards).

33508719.name: Morphing Jar
33508719.text: FLIP: Both players discard all the cards in their hands, then draw 5 cards.

10071456.name: Protector of the Throne
10071456.text: While the king is away, this queen protects his throne with a mighty defense.

7892180.name: Psychic Kappa
7892180.text: An amphibian with a myriad of powers to shield it from enemy attacks.

29155212.name: Pumpking the King of Ghosts
29155212.text: If "Castle of Dark Illusions" is face-up on the Field, increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 900 points. As long this "Castle of Dark Illusions" remains face-up on the Field, the ATK and DEF of this card continues to increase by 100 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after this card is activated.

76754619.name: Pyramid Energy
76754619.text:
You can select and activate 1 of the following effects: 
Increase the ATK of all face-up monsters on your side of the field by 200 points until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.
Increase the DEF of all face-up monsters on your side of the field by 500 points until the End Phase of the turn this card is activated.

53569894.name: Pyramid of Light
53569894.text: If this face-up card is removed from your side of the field, destroy "Andro Sphinx" and "Sphinx Teleia" on your side of the field and remove them from play.

77044671.name: Pyramid Turtle
77044671.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie-Type monster with 2000 or less DEF from your Deck.

1082946.name: Pyro Clock of Destiny
1082946.text: Move the turn count forward by 1 turn. The turn in which this card is activated continuous as normal.

73081602.name: Queen Bird
73081602.text: This monster attacks using its huge beak.

4179849.name: Queen of Autumn Leaves
4179849.text: Queen of the Emerald Forest and wife of the Spirit King, she lives surrounded by vivid red leaves.

5901497.name: Queen's Double
5901497.text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

38723936.name: Question
38723936.text: When activating this card, your opponent cannot check cards in the Graveyard. Your opponent calls the name of the first monster found at the bottom of your Graveyard. If he/she calls it right, the monster is removed from play. If he/she calls it wrong, the monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field.

31440542.name: Rafflesia Seduction
31440542.text: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the turn.

90810762.name: Raging Flame Sprite
90810762.text: This card can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent by a direct attack: This card gains 1000 ATK.

12580477.name: Raigeki
12580477.text: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

4178474.name: Raigeki Break
4178474.text: Discard 1 card to target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

56260110.name: Raimei
56260110.text: Decrease your opponent's Life Points by 300 points.

66719324.name: Rain of Mercy
66719324.text: Increase the Life Points of both players by 1000 points.

21347810.name: Rainbow Flower
21347810.text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

51267887.name: Raise Body Heat
51267887.text: A Dinosaur-Type monster equipped with this card increases its ATK and DEF by 300 points.

25236056.name: Rare Metal Dragon
25236056.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set.

12503902.name: Rare Metalmorph
12503902.text: Select 1 Machine-Type monster on your side of the field; it gains 500 ATK. Only once, negate the effect of a Spell Card that targets the monster. When the selected monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

7625614.name: Raregold Armor
7625614.text: As long as you control the monster equipped with this card, your opponent cannot attack other monsters other than the equipped monster.

85309439.name: Ray & Temperature
85309439.text: The Sun and the North Wind join hands to deliver a devastating combination of heat and gale-force winds.

82529174.name: Ray of Hope
82529174.text: Add 2 LIGHT monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck and shuffle it.

74694807.name: Re-Fusion
74694807.text: Pay 800 Life Points. Select 1 Fusion Monster from your Graveyard, Special Summon it to your side of the field and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, remove the equipped monster from play.

31785398.name: Ready for Intercepting
31785398.text: Target 1 face-up Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster on the field; change that target to face-down Defense Position.

28121403.name: Really Eternal Rest
28121403.text: Destroy all monsters equipped with an Equip Card(s).

33066139.name: Reaper of the Cards
33066139.text: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

85684223.name: Reaper on the Nightmare
85684223.text:
Spirit Reaper + "Nightmare Horse"
This card is not destroyed as a result of battle. Destroy this card when it is targeted by the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster. This card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly even if there is a monster on your opponent's side of the field. If this card successfully attacks your opponent's Life Points directly, your opponent discards 1 card randomly from his/her hand."

58577036.name: Reasoning
58577036.text: Your opponent declares a monster Level. Reveal cards from the top of your Deck until you reveal a monster that can be Normal Summoned. If that monster is the same Level as the one declared by your opponent, send all revealed cards to the Graveyard. If not, Special Summon the revealed monster, also send the remaining cards to the Graveyard.

37576645.name: Reckless Greed
37576645.text: Draw 2 cards and skip your next 2 Draw Phases.

96316857.name: Recycle
96316857.text: During your Standby Phase, by paying 300 Life Points, select 1 non-Monster Card in your Graveyard and return it to the bottom of your Deck.

65570596.name: Red Archery Girl
65570596.text: A mermaid archer that hides in a protective shell, waiting for the right moment to strike.

38199696.name: Red Medicine
38199696.text: Increase your Life Points by 500 points.

74677422.name: Red-Eyes B. Dragon
74677422.text: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

64335805.name: Red-Eyes Black Metal Dragon
64335805.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" equipped with "Metalmorph".

96561011.name: Red-Eyes Darkness Dragon
96561011.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" and cannot by Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 300 ATK for each Dragon-Type monster in your Graveyard.

2851070.name: Reflect Bounder
2851070.text: When this face-up Attack Position monster is attacked by a monster on your opponent's side of the field, before damage calculation, this card inflicts damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the ATK of the attacking monster. Then, after damage calculation, this card is destroyed.

70821187.name: Regenerating Mummy
70821187.text: When this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Return this card to the hand.

32807846.name: Reinforcement of the Army
32807846.text: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type monster from your Deck to your hand.

17814387.name: Reinforcements
17814387.text: Increase the ATK of 1 face-up monster on the field by 500 points until the end of this turn.

75417459.name: Release Restraint
75417459.text: Tribute 1 "Gearfried the Iron Knight"; Special Summon 1 "Gearfried the Swordmaster" from your hand or Deck.

64631466.name: Relinquished
64631466.text: Once per turn, select 1 monster your opponent controls and equip it to this card (only 1 monster can be equipped to it at a time). This card's ATK and DEF become equal to the ATK and DEF of the monster equipped to this card. If this card is destroyed by battle, the equipped monster is destroyed instead, and any battle damage you received from the battle is also inflicted to your opponent.

22589918.name: Reload
22589918.text: Add all cards in your hand to your Deck and shuffle it. Then draw the same number of cards that you added to your Deck.

94739788.name: Remove Brainwashing
94739788.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, the control of all monsters on the field returns to the original owners.

51482758.name: Remove Trap
51482758.text: Destroys 1 face-up Trap Card on the field.

14878871.name: Rescue Cat
14878871.text: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 2 Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monsters from your Deck. Those monsters are destroyed during the End Phase.

62420419.name: Reshef the Dark Being
62420419.text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Final Ritual of the Ancients". Discard 1 Spell Card from your hand. Take control of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field until the End Phase. You can only use this effect once per turn.

8951260.name: Respect Play
8951260.text: During their respective turns, each player must show their opponent their hand.

99518961.name: Restructer Revolution
99518961.text: Inflict 200 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points for each card in your opponent's hand.

27174286.name: Return from the Different Dimension
27174286.text: Pay half your Life Points. Special Summon as many of your banished monsters as possible. During the End Phase, banish all monsters that were Special Summoned by this effect.

19827717.name: Return of the Doomed
19827717.text: Discard 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Return 1 of your monsters that is destroyed as a result of battle and sent to your Graveyard during this turn to your hand at the end of this turn.

5990062.name: Reversal Quiz
5990062.text: Send all cards in your hand and on your side of the field to the Graveyard. Call the type of card (Spell, Trap, or Monster) on top of your Deck. If you call it right, exchange your current Life Points with your opponent's current ones.

77622396.name: Reverse Trap
77622396.text: All increases and decreases to ATK and DEF are reversed for the turn in which this card is activated.

31709826.name: Revival Jam
31709826.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can pay 1000 Life Points; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position during your next turn's Standby Phase.

31066283.name: Revival of Dokurorider
31066283.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon Dokurorider". You must also offer monsters whose total Level Stars equal 6 or more as a Tribute from the field or your hand."

70903634.name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One
70903634.text: A forbidden right arm sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

8124921.name: Right Leg of the Forbidden One
8124921.text: A forbidden right leg sealed by magic. Whosoever breaks this seal will know infinite power.

83555666.name: Ring of Destruction
83555666.text: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to both players equal to that target's ATK.

20436034.name: Ring of Magnetism
20436034.text: You can only equip this card to a monster on your side of the field. Decrease the ATK and DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. In addition, all the monsters on your opponent's side of the field can only attack the monster equipped with this card, if they attack.

34016756.name: Riryoku
34016756.text: Select 2 face-up monsters on the field. Halve the ATK of 1 monster, and add that amount to the ATK of the other monster, until the End Phase.

70344351.name: Riryoku Field
70344351.text: Negate the activation of a Spell Card that targets 1 monster on the field and destroy the Spell Card.

45778932.name: Rising Air Current
45778932.text: Increase the ATK of all WIND monsters by 500 and decreases their DEF by 400 points.

30450531.name: Rite of Spirit
30450531.text: Select 1 "Gravekeeper's" monster in your Graveyard and Special Summon it. This card's activation and effect are unaffected by "Necrovalley".

54351224.name: Ritual Weapon
54351224.text: This card can only be equipped to a Ritual Monster of Level 6 or less. Increase the ATK and DEF of the equipped monster by 1500 points.

90846359.name: Rivalry of Warlords
90846359.text: Each player can only control 1 Type of monster. Send all other face-up monsters they control to the Graveyard.

88279736.name: Robbin' Goblin
88279736.text: Each time a monster you control inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, your opponent discards 1 random card.

92421852.name: Robolady
92421852.text: A warrior fully covered with metal. It upgrades by fusing with "Roboyarou".

44203504.name: Robotic Knight
44203504.text: The Commander of Machine-Types, he serves the Machine King. He is famous for the way he controls his troops.

38916461.name: Roboyarou
38916461.text: A warrior fully covered with metal. It upgrades by fusing with "Robolady".

28143906.name: Roc from the Valley of Haze
28143906.text: When this card is sent directly from your hand to the Graveyard, add this card to the Deck and shuffle it.

20781762.name: Rock Bombardment
20781762.text: Send 1 Rock-Type monster from your Deck to the Graveyard; inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

68846917.name: Rock Ogre Grotto #1
68846917.text: Protected by a solid body of rock, this monster throws a bone-shattering punch.

53890795.name: Rocket Jumper
53890795.text: If the only cards on your opponent's side of the field are Defense Position monsters, this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

95515060.name: Rod of Silence - Kay'est
95515060.text: Increase the DEF of a monster equipped with this card by 500 points. Negate the effect of a Spell Card (excluding this card) that targets the monster equipped with this card and destroy the Spell Card.

94793422.name: Rod of the Mind's Eye
94793422.text: When a monster equipped with this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, the damage becomes 1000 points.

91939608.name: Rogue Doll
91939608.text: A deadly doll gifted with mystical power, it is particularly powerful when attacking against dark forces.

39004808.name: Root Water
39004808.text: An amphibian capable of calling up a massive tidal wave from the dark seas to wipe out enemy monsters.

93382620.name: Rope of Life
93382620.text: When a monster(s) is destroyed by battle and sent to your Graveyard: Discard your entire hand to target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it, and if you do, it gains 800 ATK.

46303688.name: Roulette Barrel
46303688.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can roll a six-sided die twice. Select one result and destroy 1 face-up monster on the field whose level is equal to the result.

33950246.name: Royal Command
33950246.text: Negate the activation and effects of all Flip Effect monsters effects.

51452091.name: Royal Decree
51452091.text: Negate all other Trap Card effects on the field.

16509093.name: Royal Keeper
16509093.text: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is flipped face-up, it gains 300 ATK and DEF until the end of the turn. (If attacked, this effect resolves after damage calculation.)

70791313.name: Royal Magical Library
70791313.text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card (max 3). You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card to draw 1 card.

93016201.name: Royal Oppression
93016201.text: Either player can pay 800 Life Points to negate the Special Summon of a monster(s), and/or an effect that Special Summons a monster(s), and destroy those cards.

56058888.name: Royal Surrender
56058888.text: You can only activate this card when your opponent activates a Continuous Trap Card. Negate the activation and the effect of the card and destroy it.

72405967.name: Royal Tribute
72405967.text: Activate only while you control "Necrovalley". Both players discard all Monster Cards in their hands.

26378150.name: Rude Kaiser
26378150.text: With an axe in each hand, this monster delivers heavy damage.

70046172.name: Rush Recklessly
70046172.text: Target face-up monster gains 700 ATK until the End Phase.

57281778.name: Ryu Kokki
57281778.text: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled a Warrior or Spellcaster-Type monster: Destroy that monster.

49868263.name: Ryu Senshi
49868263.text: A Fusion Summon of this monster can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, negate the effect of a Normal Trap Card by paying 1000 Life Points. Negate the effect of a Spell Card that targets this card and destroy it.

15303296.name: Ryu-Kishin
15303296.text: A very elusive creature that looks like a harmless statue until it attacks.

42647539.name: Ryu-Kishin Clown
42647539.text: When this card is Summoned (including Flip Summon and Special Summon), select 1 face-up monster on the field and change its battle position.

24611934.name: Ryu-Kishin Powered
24611934.text: A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.

2964201.name: Ryu-Ran
2964201.text: A vicious little dragon sheltered in an egg that looks deceptively harmless.

30914564.name: Sacred Crane
30914564.text: When this card is Special Summoned, the controller of this card draws 1 card.

61441708.name: Sacred Phoenix of Nephthys
61441708.text: During your next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. When this card is Special Summoned this way: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

13604200.name: Sage's Stone
13604200.text: Activate only if you control a face-up "Dark Magician Girl". Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your hand or Deck.

66602787.name: Saggi the Dark Clown
66602787.text: This clown appears from nowhere and executes very strange moves to avoid enemy attacks.

56120475.name: Sakuretsu Armor
56120475.text: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares an attack. Destroy the attacking monster.

32268901.name: Salamandra
32268901.text: Equip only to a FIRE monster; it gains 700 ATK.

96947648.name: Salvage
96947648.text: Select 2 WATER monsters with 1500 or less ATK in your Graveyard, and add them to your hand.

50593156.name: Sand Gambler
50593156.text: Toss a coin 3 times. If all 3 results are Heads, destroy all monsters on your opponent's side of the field. If all 3 results are Tails, destroy all monsters on your side of the field. You can only activate this effect once per turn, during your Main Phase.

73051941.name: Sand Stone
73051941.text: Appears from underground and attacks with long, snake-like tentacles.

25955164.name: Sanga of the Thunder
25955164.text: You can only activate this card's effect during your opponent's damage calculation. Make the ATK of a monster attacking this card 0 during damage calculation. This effect can only be used once as long as this card remains face-up on the field.

26202165.name: Sangan
26202165.text: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Add 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand.

16222645.name: Sasuke Samurai
16222645.text: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that face-down monster.

11760174.name: Sasuke Samurai #2
11760174.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can pay 800 Life Points. If you do this, until the End Phase, Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated.

77379481.name: Sasuke Samurai #3
77379481.text: When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent draws cards until his/her hand has 7 cards.

64538655.name: Sasuke Samurai #4
64538655.text: If this card battles a monster, toss a coin and call heads or tails before damage calculation. If you call it right, destroy the opponent's monster with this effect.

73915051.name: Scapegoat
73915051.text: Special Summon 4 "Sheep Tokens" (Beast-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Set).

67532912.name: Science Soldier
67532912.text: Soldiers equipped with state-of-the-art weaponry to face unknown creatures.

10352095.name: Scroll of Bewitchment
10352095.text: Select 1 Attribute when you activate this card. Change the Attribute of the equipped monster to the one you select.

42071342.name: Sea Serpent Warrior of Darkness
42071342.text: A warrior who defends the world of the Sea of Darkness. He prides himself on his fighting prowess both on the ground and, of course, in the water.

97809599.name: Seal of the Ancients
97809599.text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Pick up and see all face-down cards on your opponent's side of the field, then return them to their original positions. (The effects of the face-down cards are not activated).

2468169.name: Sealmaster Meisei
2468169.text: One of the few people who has a good command of Talismans. His history is a mystery.

22537443.name: Sebek's Blessing
22537443.text: Activate only when a monster you control has attacked your opponent directly. Gain Life Points equal to the Battle Damage that monster inflicted to your opponent.

36562627.name: Second Coin Toss
36562627.text: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, you can negate the effects of a card requiring a coin toss once per turn and redo the coin toss.

19086954.name: Second Goblin
19086954.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your Giant Orc" as an Equip Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, you can change the equipped monster's battle position once per turn. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)"

27053506.name: Secret Barrel
27053506.text: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the total number of cards on your opponent's side of the field and in your opponent's hand x 200.

77876207.name: Secret Pass to the Treasures
77876207.text: Select 1 face-up monster with an ATK equal to 1000 points or less on your side of the field. During the turn this card is activated, the selected monster can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

6740720.name: Seiyaryu
6740720.text: A mystical dragon that burns away the unworthy with its mystic flames.

57585212.name: Self-Destruct Button
57585212.text: You can only activate this card while your Life Points are lower than your opponent's Life Points and the difference is 7000 points or more. Both players' Life Points become 0.

23401839.name: Senju of the Thousand Hands
23401839.text: When this card is Normal Summoned or Flip Summoned, you can select 1 Ritual Monster Card from your Deck and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

60391791.name: Senri Eye
60391791.text: Once per turn, during each of your Standby Phases, you can pay 100 Life Points to look at 1 card on the top of your opponent's Deck and return it to its original position. Your opponent cannot look at the card.

49398568.name: Serial Spell
49398568.text: You can only activate this card when you activate one of your Normal Spell Cards. Discard all the cards in your hand to the Graveyard. The effect of this card becomes the same as the Normal Spell Card.

66516792.name: Serpent Night Dragon
66516792.text: A dragon created from the soul of a wicked knight.

71829750.name: Serpentine Princess
71829750.text: If this face-up card is returned from the field to your Deck, select and Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your Deck to your side of the field. Then shuffle your Deck.

2792265.name: Servant of Catabolism
2792265.text: This monster may attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

3819470.name: Seven Tools of the Bandit
3819470.text: When a Trap Card is activated: Pay 1000 Life Points; negate the activation, and destroy it.

30778711.name: Shadow Ghoul
30778711.text: Increase the ATK of this monster by 100 points for each monster in your Graveyard.

58621589.name: Shadow of Eyes
58621589.text: When a monster(s) is set on your opponent's side of the field: Target 1 of those Set monsters; change that Set monster to face-up Attack Position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

29267084.name: Shadow Spell
29267084.text: Activate this card by targeting 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; it loses 700 ATK, also it cannot attack or change its battle position. When it leaves the field, destroy this card.

37620434.name: Shadow Tamer
37620434.text: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up Fiend-Type monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the End Phase.

9603356.name: Shadowknight Archfiend
9603356.text: The controller of this card pays 900 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. The Battle Damage this card inflicts to your opponent is halved.

20939559.name: Shadowslayer
20939559.text: If all monsters your opponent controls are in Defense Position, this card can attack your opponent directly.

4035199.name: Shapesnatch
4035199.text: A bow tie with horrible power, it attacks an opponent by controlling others.

56830749.name: Share the Pain
56830749.text: Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field. Your opponent must Tribute 1 monster on their side of the field.

52097679.name: Shield & Sword
52097679.text: Switch the original ATK and DEF of all face-up monsters on the field until the end of this turn. Any additions and subtractions to ATK and DEF due to card effects are applied to the new ATK and DEF. Monsters Summoned after this card's activation are excluded.

59560625.name: Shift
59560625.text: You can activate this card when your opponent designates 1 monster on your side of the field as a target of a Spell, Trap, or battle attack. Switch the target to another monster on your side of the field.

59237154.name: Shifting Shadows
59237154.text: Pay 300 Life Points to rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters on your side of the field, then return them in face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect once per turn.

86327225.name: Shinato, King of a Higher Plane
86327225.text: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, Shinato's Ark". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand. When this card destroys a Defense Position monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict damage to your opponent's Life Points equal to the original ATK of the destroyed monster."

60365591.name: Shinato's Ark
60365591.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon Shinato, King of a Higher Plane". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand."

87303357.name: Shining Abyss
87303357.text: This monster employs the powers of both Light and Darkness.

95956346.name: Shining Angel
95956346.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

95638658.name: Shooting Star Bow - Ceal
95638658.text: Decrease the ATK of a monster equipped with this card by 1000 points. A monster equipped with this card can attack your opponent's Life Points directly.

1995985.name: Silent Swordsman LV3
1995985.text: Negate the effects of your opponent's Spell Cards that target this card. During your Standby Phase, you can send this face-up card to the Graveyard to Special Summon 1 "Silent Swordsman LV5" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

74388798.name: Silent Swordsman LV5

61370518.name: Skull Archfiend of Lightning

86652646.name: Skull Dog Marron

3627449.name: Skull Guardian

98139712.name: Skull Invitation

15653824.name: Skull Knight #2

10202894.name: Skull Red Bird

In addition, increase the ATK of this monster by 1000 points during the Damage Step when this monster inflicts Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

41872150.name: Swarm of Locusts

At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster(s) by battle and sent it to the Graveyard this Battle Phase: Equip all those monsters from the Graveyard to this card as an Equip Spell Card(s) with this effect.
The equipped monster gains 200 ATK.

37120512.name: Sword of Dark Destruction

When "Sealmaster Meisei" is removed from the field, destroy this card."

19312169.name: Talisman of Trap Sealing
19312169.text: You can only activate this card while there is a face-up Sealmaster Meisei" on your side of the field. While this card is face-up on the field, Trap Cards cannot be activated and the effects of face-up Trap Cards on the field are negated. When "Sealmaster Meisei" is removed from the field, destroy this card."

63308047.name: Terra the Terrible
