90330453.text: Destroy all face-up Spellcaster-Type monsters on the field.

78637313.name: Call of Darkness
78637313.text: All monsters restored with "Monster Reborn" are sent to the Graveyard. "Monster Reborn" also cannot be played as long as this card remains on the field.

3492538.name: Insect Armor with Laser Cannon
3492538.text: Equip only to an Insect monster. It gains 700 ATK.

63224564.name: Cyber Shield
63224564.text: Equip only to "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters". It gains 500 ATK.

57728570.name: Crush Card Virus
57728570.text: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 1000 or less ATK; your opponent takes no damage until the end of the next turn after this card resolves, also, you look at your opponent's hand and all monsters they control, and if you do, destroy the monsters among them with 1500 or more ATK, then your opponent can destroy up to 3 monsters with 1500 or more ATK in their Deck.

37390589.name: Kunai with Chain
37390589.text:
Activate 1 or both of these effects (simultaneously).
 When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; change that target to Defense Position.
 Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK.

16229315.name: Gale Dogra
16229315.text: You can pay 3000 Life Points to send 1 monster from your Extra Deck to the Graveyard.

84133008.name: Monster Eye
84133008.text: You can pay 1000 Life Points; add 1 "Polymerization" from your Graveyard to your hand.

37043180.name: D.D. Warrior
37043180.text: After damage calculation, when this card battles a monster: Banish that monster, also banish this card.

26302522.name: Blast Sphere
26302522.text: If this face-down Defense Position card was attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: Equip this card to the attacking monster. Then, during your opponent's next Standby Phase: Destroy the monster this card is equipped to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field.

38247752.name: Dark-Eyes Illusionist
38247752.text: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; it cannot attack while this card is face-up on the field.

42035044.name: Panther Warrior
42035044.text: This card cannot declare an attack unless you Tribute 1 monster.

80987696.name: Time Machine
80987696.text: When a monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Special Summon that monster to the same field it was on, in the same battle position it was in when destroyed.

77207191.name: Berfomet
77207191.text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" from your Deck to your hand.

96008713.name: Magical Arm Shield
96008713.text: When your opponent declares an attack while you control a monster: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; take control of that target until the end of the Battle Phase, and if you do, it is attacked instead, and you proceed to damage calculation.

40703222.name: Multiply
40703222.text: Tribute 1 face-up "Kuriboh"; Special Summon as many "Kuriboh Tokens" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 200) as possible, in Defense Position. They cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

30860696.name: Rocket Warrior
30860696.text: During your Battle Phase, this card cannot be destroyed by battle and you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. If this card attacks a monster, after damage calculation: That attack target loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

58775978.name: Nightmare's Steelcage
58775978.text: This card remains on the field for 2 of your opponent's turns. While this card is face-up on the field, no monsters can attack.

99789342.name: Dark Magic Curtain
99789342.text: Pay half your LP; Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" from your Deck. You cannot Summon other monsters the turn you activate this card (but you can Set).

25774450.name: Mystic Box
25774450.text: Target 1 monster your opponent controls and 1 monster you control; destroy the first target, then give control of the second target to your opponent.

27827272.name: Makiu, the Magical Mist
27827272.text: Target 1 "Summoned Skull", or 1 Thunder monster, in your Monster Zone; destroy all monsters your opponent controls with DEF less than or equal to the ATK of that monster. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

35563539.name: Mystical Refpanel
35563539.text: Activate only when a Spell Card that targets 1 player is activated. The effect of that Spell Card is applied to the other player instead.

26376390.name: Copycat
26376390.text: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's ATK/DEF become equal to that monster's original ATK/DEF.

54912977.name: Ancient Lamp
54912977.text: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon "La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp" from your hand. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect. Before damage calculation, if this card is being attacked by an opponent's monster, and was face-down at the start of the Damage Step: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; the attacking monster attacks it instead, and you proceed to damage calculation.

48948935.name: Masked Beast Des Gardius
48948935.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 2 monsters, including at least 1 "Grand Tiki Elder" or "Melchid the Four-Face Beast". When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, equip 1 "The Mask of Remnants" from your Deck to 1 monster on the field.

22610082.name: The Mask of Remnants
22610082.text: Shuffle this card into its owner's Deck, OR if this card was put into play by the effect of "Masked Beast Des Gardius", this card is treated as an Equip Card. Control of the equipped monster is switched.

7914843.name: Electromagnetic Bagworm
7914843.text:
FLIP: Target 1 Machine-Type monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until your next End Phase.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

39180960.name: Rigorous Reaver
39180960.text:
FLIP: Each player discards 1 card.
If this card is destroyed by battle: The monster that destroyed it loses 500 ATK and DEF.

54591086.name: Virus Cannon
54591086.text: Tribute any number of monsters, except Tokens; your opponent sends an equal number of Spells from their Deck to the GY (or all their Spells, if lower than the number of Tributes).

36354007.name: Gilford the Lightning
36354007.text: You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

81059524.name: Des Volstgalph
81059524.text: If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. Each time a Normal or Quick-Play Spell Card resolves, this card gains 200 ATK until the end of this turn.

90960358.name: Toon Dark Magician Girl
90960358.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 monster, while you control "Toon World". If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed, destroy this card. Can attack your opponent directly, unless they control a Toon monster, in which case this card must target a Toon monster for its attacks. Gains 300 ATK for every "Dark Magician" or "Magician of Black Chaos" in either player's GY.

63749102.name: Exarion Universe
63749102.text: During your Battle Step, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: You can make this card lose exactly 400 ATK, and if it does, it will inflict piercing battle damage. These effects last until the end of this turn.

29762407.name: Temple of the Kings
29762407.text: You can activate 1 Trap Card the turn it was Set. You can send 1 "Mystical Beast of Serket" in your Monster Zone and this card you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck, or 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of "Temple of the Kings" once per turn.

89194033.name: Mystical Beast of Serket
89194033.text: If you do not control "Temple of the Kings", destroy this card. Banish any monster destroyed by battle with this card. If this card destroys a monster by battle: It gains 500 ATK.

17484499.name: Exchange of the Spirit
17484499.text: If both players have 15 or more cards in their Graveyards: Pay 1000 LP; each player swaps the cards in their Graveyard with the cards in their Deck, then shuffles their Deck. You can only activate 1 "Exchange of the Spirit" per Duel.

56043447.name: Viser Des
56043447.text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; during your third Standby Phase after this effect's activation, destroy that monster. This card cannot be destroyed by battle while the targeted monster is on the field.

99747800.name: Legendary Fiend
99747800.text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: This card gains 700 ATK.

64788463.name: King's Knight
64788463.text: When this card is Normal Summoned while you control "Queen's Knight": You can Special Summon 1 "Jack's Knight" from your Deck.

37507488.name: Relieve Monster
37507488.text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 monster you control; return that target to the hand, then Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your hand.

2047519.name: Hidden Soldiers
2047519.text: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons a monster: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower DARK monster from your hand.

93260132.name: Spell Shattering Arrow
93260132.text: Destroy as many face-up Spells your opponent controls as possible, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each.

76714458.name: Spell of Pain
76714458.text: When your opponent activates a card or effect that would inflict effect damage to you: Your opponent takes the effect damage from that card or effect, instead.

41442341.name: Puppet Master
41442341.text: When this card is Tribute Summoned: You can pay 2000 LP, then target 2 Fiend monsters in your GY; Special Summon those targets, but they cannot attack this turn.

24874630.name: Fiend's Sanctuary
24874630.text: Special Summon 1 "Metal Fiend Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). It cannot attack. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from battles involving it. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 1000 LP or destroy this Token.

26905245.name: Metal Reflect Slime
26905245.text: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Aqua/WATER/Level 10/ATK 0/DEF 3000). (This card is also still a Trap.) This card cannot attack.

14731897.name: Unity
14731897.text: Select 1 monster on your side of the field. The DEF of the selected monster becomes equal to the combined original DEF of all face-up monsters on your side of the field, until the end of this turn.

81332143.name: Yu-Jo Friendship
81332143.text: Offer your opponent a handshake. If they accept your handshake, each player's Life Points become half the combined Life Points of both players. If you have "Unity" in your hand and show it to your opponent, they must accept the handshake.

55948544.name: Judgment of the Pharaoh
55948544.text:
Pay half of your Life Points. Select and activate an appropriate effect which can be applied:
 If "Yu-Jo Friendship" is in your Graveyard, until the end of this turn: your opponent cannot Normal Summon, Set, Flip Summon, or Special Summon a monster(s) or activate an Effect Monster's effect.
 If "Unity" is in your Graveyard, until the end of this turn: negate the effects of all Spell and Trap Cards on your opponent's side of the field, and your opponent cannot activate or Set Spell or Trap Cards.

3366982.name: Alligator's Sword Dragon
3366982.text:
"Baby Dragon" + "Alligator's Sword"
This card can attack your opponent directly if the only face-up monsters they control are EARTH, WATER, or FIRE.

4796100.name: Chimera the Flying Mythical Beast
4796100.text:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" + "Berfomet"
(This card is always treated as a "Phantom Beast" card.)
When this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Berfomet" or 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts" in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

99267150.name: Five-Headed Dragon
99267150.text:
5 Dragon monsters_x000D_
Must be Fusion Summoned. Cannot be destroyed by battle with a DARK, EARTH, WATER, FIRE, or WIND monster.

62873545.name: Dragon Master Knight
62873545.text:
"Black Luster Soldier" + "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon"_x000D_
Must be Fusion Summoned. This card gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster you control, except this card.

50400231.name: Satellite Cannon
50400231.text: This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a Level 7 or lower monster. During each of your End Phases: This card gains 1000 ATK. If this card attacks, this increased ATK returns to 0, after damage calculation.

77936940.name: Gernia
77936940.text: During your next Standby Phase, after this face-up card you control was destroyed and sent to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon it.

81510157.name: Soul Taker
81510157.text: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target, then your opponent gains 1000 LP.

67227834.name: Magic Formula
67227834.text: Equip only to "Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl". It gains 700 ATK. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Gain 1000 LP.

80304126.name: Magician's Valkyria
80304126.text: Monsters your opponent controls cannot target face-up Spellcaster-Type monsters for attacks, except this one.

86871614.name: Cloning
86871614.text: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons a monster that has a Level: Target that face-up monster; Special Summon 1 "Clone Token", with the same original Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as that target. When that target is destroyed and sent to the GY, destroy this Token.

42534368.name: Silent Doom
42534368.text: Target 1 Normal Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position, but it cannot attack.

44910027.name: Victory Dragon
44910027.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. To Tribute Summon this card, you must Tribute 3 Dragon-Type monsters. If this card attacks your opponent directly and reduces their Life Points to 0, you win the Match.

5640330.name: Hannibal Necromancer
5640330.text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Spell Counter on it (max. 1). You can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card, then target 1 face-up Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.

63665875.name: Goblin Zombie
63665875.text: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the GY. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 Zombie monster with 1200 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

28553439.name: Magical Dimension
28553439.text: If you control a Spellcaster monster: Target 1 monster you control; Tribute that target, then Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your hand, then you can destroy 1 monster on the field.

81439173.name: Foolish Burial
81439173.text: Send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY.

55713623.name: Shrink
55713623.text: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; its original ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn.

30707994.name: Maximum Six
30707994.text: When this card is Tribute Summoned: Roll a six-sided die, and this card gains ATK equal to the result x 200.

76895648.name: Dangerous Machine Type-6
76895648.text:
During each of your Standby Phases: Roll a six-sided die and apply the result.
 1: Discard 1 card.
 2: Your opponent discards 1 card.
 3: Draw 1 card.
 4: Your opponent draws 1 card.
 5: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
 6: Destroy this card.

3078576.name: Yata-Garasu
3078576.text: Cannot be Special Summoned. During the End Phase of the turn this card was Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Return it to the hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Skip the Draw Phase of their next turn.

37383714.name: Soul Rope
37383714.text: When a monster you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard (except during the Damage Step): Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck.

98494543.name: Magical Stone Excavation
98494543.text: Discard 2 cards, then target 1 Spell in your GY; add it to your hand.

1224927.name: Malevolent Catastrophe
1224927.text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

41172955.name: Green Gadget
41172955.text: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Red Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.

86445415.name: Red Gadget
86445415.text: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Yellow Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.

13839120.name: Yellow Gadget
13839120.text: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Green Gadget" from your Deck to your hand.

13955608.name: Stronghold the Moving Fortress
13955608.text: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Machine/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 2000). (This card is also still a Trap.) While you control "Green Gadget", "Red Gadget", and "Yellow Gadget", this card gains 3000 ATK.

14778250.name: The Tricky
14778250.text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

75622824.name: Tricky Spell 4
75622824.text: Send 1 face-up "The Tricky" you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon "Tricky Tokens" (Spellcaster-Type/WIND/Level 5/ATK 2000/DEF 1200) in Defense Position, equal to the number of monsters your opponent controls. "Tricky Tokens" cannot declare an attack.

33184167.name: Tribe-Infecting Virus
33184167.text: Discard 1 card from your hand and declare 1 Type of monster. Destroy all face-up monsters of the declared Type on the field.

66865880.name: Marshmallon Glasses
66865880.text: While "Marshmallon" is in your Monster Zone, your opponent cannot target monsters other than "Marshmallon" for attacks.

30683373.name: Shield Crush
30683373.text: Target 1 Defense Position monster on the field; destroy that target.

67688478.name: Gemini Imps
67688478.text: During either player's turn, when your opponent activates a Spell Card, Trap Card, or monster effect that could make you discard when it resolves: You can send this card from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. Then draw 1 card.

3072077.name: Return Zombie
3072077.text: During your Standby Phase: You can pay 500 Life Points; add this card from your Graveyard to your hand. You must have no cards in your hand to activate and to resolve this effect.

30461781.name: Legacy of Yata-Garasu
30461781.text:
Activate 1 of these effects:
 Draw 1 card.
 Activate only if your opponent controls a face-up Spirit monster. Draw 2 cards.

79852326.name: Zoma the Spirit
79852326.text: Special Summon this card in Defense Position as an Effect Monster (Zombie/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 500). (This card is also still a Trap.) If this card Summoned this way is destroyed by battle: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the monster that destroyed it.

65743242.name: Call of the Earthbound
65743242.text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You choose the target of the attack.

36931229.name: Castle Gate
36931229.text: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, if this card is in face-up Attack Position, you can Tribute 1 Level 5 or lower monster to inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK.

9720537.name: Owner's Seal
9720537.text: Return control of all monsters on the field to their original owners.

34294855.name: Vampire's Curse
34294855.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can pay 500 Life Points; Special Summon it during the Standby Phase of the next turn. When you do: It gains 500 ATK.

60399954.name: Union Attack
60399954.text: Target 1 face-up monster you control; add up the total ATK of all other face-up Attack Position monsters you currently control, then during the Battle Phase of this turn only, the monster gains that much ATK, but cannot inflict battle damage to your opponent, also other face-up Attack Position monsters cannot attack.

97783659.name: Blood Sucker
97783659.text: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the GY.

60577362.name: Overpowering Eye
60577362.text: Target 1 Zombie monster you control with 2000 or less ATK; it can attack directly this turn.

24857466.name: Van'Dalgyon the Dark Dragon Lord
24857466.text:
If you negate the activation of an opponent's Spell/Trap Card(s), or opponent's monster effect(s), with a Counter Trap Card (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way, activate these effects and resolve in sequence, depending on the type of card(s) negated by that Counter Trap:
 Spell: Inflict 1500 damage to your opponent.
 Trap: Target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.
 Monster: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it.

30888983.name: The Selection
30888983.text: Pay 1000 Life Points. Negate the Summon of a monster that has the same Type as a monster on the field, and destroy it.

79766336.name: Trap of Darkness
79766336.text: If your LP is 3000 or less: Pay 1000 LP, then target 1 Normal Trap in your GY, except "Trap of Darkness"; this card's effect becomes that target's activated effect, then banish that target.

62180201.name: The Wicked Dreadroot
62180201.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set except by Tributing 3 monsters. Halve the ATK and DEF of all monsters on the field, except this card.

423585.name: Summoner Monk
423585.text: While this card is face-up on the field, it cannot be Tributed. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: Change this card to Defense Position. Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell; Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your Deck, but that monster cannot attack this turn.

28649820.name: Embodiment of Apophis
28649820.text: During either player's Main Phase: Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Reptile-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1600/DEF 1800). (This card is also still a Trap Card.)

73665146.name: Silent Magician LV4
73665146.text: Each time your opponent draws a card(s), place 1 Spell Counter on this card (max. 5). This card gains 500 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. During the Standby Phase of your next turn after the 5th Spell Counter is placed on this card: You can send this face-up card with 5 Spell Counters on it to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Silent Magician LV8" from your hand or Deck.

72443568.name: Silent Magician LV8
72443568.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Silent Magician LV4" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects.

50755.name: Magician's Circle
50755.text: When a Spellcaster monster declares an attack: Each player Special Summons 1 Spellcaster monster with 2000 or less ATK from their Deck in Attack Position.

36045450.name: Magicians Unite
36045450.text: If you control 2 or more Attack Position Spellcaster monsters: Target 1 of them; its ATK becomes 3000 until the end of this turn, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, other Spellcaster monsters you control cannot attack.

27769400.name: Tualatin
27769400.text: If it is your opponent's Battle Phase, a monster you controlled at the start of this Battle Phase was just destroyed, and all monsters you controlled at the start of this Battle Phase (min. 2) have now been destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way: Choose an Attribute, and if you do, destroy all face-up monsters with that Attribute. Your opponent cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters with that Attribute.

6150044.name: Arcana Knight Joker
6150044.text:
"Queen's Knight" + "Jack's Knight" + "King's Knight"_x000D_
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above materials. Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that targets this face-up card on the field (Quick Effect): You can discard the same type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap); negate the effect.

48675364.name: Archfiend General
48675364.text: You can discard this card to the Graveyard to add 1 "Pandemonium" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is on the field but "Pandemonium" is not on the field, destroy this card.

84824601.name: Botanical Girl
84824601.text: When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Plant-Type monster with 1000 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

45462639.name: Dark Red Enchanter
45462639.text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 2 Spell Counters on it. Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. Gains 300 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. Once per turn: You can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card; discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

81977953.name: Desert Twister
81977953.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 WIND and 1 EARTH monsters from your GY. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it.

80186010.name: Destroyersaurus
80186010.text: You can discard this card to the Graveyard; add 1 "Jurassic World" from your Deck to your hand.

41113025.name: Diskblade Rider
41113025.text: Once per turn: You can target 1 Normal Trap Card in your Graveyard; banish that target, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK until the end of your opponent's turn.

59793705.name: Elemental HERO Bladedge
59793705.text: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

79979666.name: Elemental HERO Bubbleman
79979666.text: If this is the only card in your hand, you can Special Summon it (from your hand). When this card is Summoned: You can draw 2 cards. You must control no other cards and have no cards in your hand to activate and to resolve this effect.

80908502.name: Elemental HERO Captain Gold
80908502.text: You can discard this card to the Graveyard; add 1 "Skyscraper" from your Deck to your hand. If "Skyscraper" is not face-up on the field, destroy this card.

89252153.name: Elemental HERO Necroshade
89252153.text: Once, while this card is in the Graveyard, 1 Level 5 or higher "Elemental HERO" monster you Normal Summon can be Summoned without Tributing.

86188410.name: Elemental HERO Wildheart
86188410.text: This card is unaffected by Trap effects.

75434695.name: Elemental HERO Woodsman
75434695.text: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

33034646.name: Flame Armor Ninja
33034646.text: When this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "Ninja" monster you control; increase its Level by 1.

66499018.name: Flame Tiger
66499018.text: During your Draw Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard and you control no monsters, instead of conducting your normal draw: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, banish it when it leaves the field.

78004197.name: Goldd, Wu-Lord of Dark World
78004197.text: If this card is discarded to the Graveyard by a card effect: If it was discarded from your hand to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect, you can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; Special Summon this card from the Graveyard, then destroy those targets (if any).

17393207.name: Gravekeeper's Commandant
17393207.text: You can discard this card to the Graveyard; add 1 "Necrovalley" from your Deck to your hand.

75064463.name: Harpie Queen
75064463.text: This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while on the field or in the GY. You can discard this card to the GY; add 1 "Harpies' Hunting Ground" from your Deck to your hand.

6061630.name: Magical Exemplar
6061630.text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 2 Spell Counters on this card when that Spell resolves. Once per turn: You can remove any number of Spell Counters from this card; Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your hand or GY whose Level is equal to the number of Spell Counters you removed.

43237273.name: Neo-Spacian Dark Panther
43237273.text: Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; until the End Phase, this card's name becomes that monster's original name, also replace this effect with that monster's original effects (if any).

41382147.name: Rallis the Star Bird
41382147.text: This card gains ATK equal to the Level of the monster that it battles x 200 during the Damage Step only. If this card attacks, it is removed from play at the end of the Damage Step and returned to your side of the field in face-up Attack Position at the beginning of your next turn's Battle Phase.

67300516.name: Red-Eyes Wyvern
67300516.text: During your End Phase, if you did not Normal Summon/Set a monster this turn: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes" monster from your Graveyard, except "Red-Eyes B. Chick".

88901771.name: Skilled Blue Magician
88901771.text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell Card resolves (max. 3). You can Tribute this card with 3 Spell Counters on it; Special Summon 1 "Gaia The Fierce Knight" monster from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard. You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 card you control that you can place a Spell Counter on; place 1 Spell Counter on it.

41589166.name: Tenkabito Shien
41589166.text: This card is unaffected by the effects of Trap Cards.

564541.name: Totem Dragon
564541.text: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Dragon-Type monster. If this card is in your Graveyard during your Standby Phase and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card in Attack Position. You cannot activate this effect if there are any monsters in your Graveyard that are not Dragon-Type. If this card is Special Summoned with this effect, remove it from play when it is removed from the field.

33365932.name: Volcanic Shell
33365932.text: Once per turn: You can pay 500 LP; add 1 "Volcanic Shell" from your Deck to your hand. This card must be in the GY to activate and to resolve this effect.

96300057.name: W-Wing Catapult
96300057.text: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "V-Tiger Jet" you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card gains 400 ATK/DEF, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

16751086.name: Warm Worm
16751086.text: If this card is destroyed, send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

43797906.name: Warrior of Atlantis
43797906.text: You can discard this card to the Graveyard; add 1 "A Legendary Ocean" from your Deck to your hand.

12171659.name: Zeradias, Herald of Heaven
12171659.text: You can discard this card to the GY; add 1 "The Sanctuary in the Sky" from your Deck to your hand. If "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is not on the field, destroy this card.

89943723.name: Elemental HERO Neos
89943723.text: ''A new Elemental HERO has arrived from Neo-Space! When he initiates a Contact Fusion with a Neo-Spacian his unknown powers are unleashed.''

51638941.name: V-Tiger Jet
51638941.text: This ace fighter is unbeatable in a dogfight. It combines with other monsters to launch an array of encircling attacks.

71408082.name: Paladin of Dark Dragon
71408082.text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Dark Dragon Ritual". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Red-Eyes B. Chick". You can only use this effect of "Paladin of Dark Dragon" once per turn.

46052429.name: Advanced Ritual Art
46052429.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the GY whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.

712559.name: Amazoness Village
712559.text: All "Amazoness" monsters gain 200 ATK. Once per turn, when an "Amazoness" monster is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Amazoness" monster from your Deck with a Level less than or equal to that "Amazoness" monster in the GY.

92001300.name: Ancient Gear Castle
92001300.text: All "Ancient Gear" monsters gain 300 ATK. Each time a monster is Normal Summoned/Set, place 1 counter on this card. If you Tribute Summon an "Ancient Gear" monster face-up, you can Tribute this card instead, if the number of its counters is equal to or greater than the number of required Tribute(s).

85106525.name: Bonfire
85106525.text: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Pyro monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Bonfire" per turn.

18803791.name: Dark Dragon Ritual
18803791.text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of Dark Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; add 1 "Red-Eyes" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand.

71490127.name: Dragon's Mirror
71490127.text: Fusion Summon 1 Dragon Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field or GY.

213326.name: E - Emergency Call
213326.text: Add 1 "Elemental HERO" monster from your Deck to your hand.

55428811.name: Fifth Hope
55428811.text: Target 5 "Elemental HERO" cards in your Graveyard; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 2 cards (draw 3 cards instead, if you had no other cards on your side of the field and in your hand when you activated this card).

18511384.name: Fusion Recovery
18511384.text: Target 1 "Polymerization" in your GY, and 1 monster in your GY that was used as material for a Fusion Summon; add them to your hand.

12247206.name: Inferno Reckless Summon
12247206.text: When exactly 1 monster with 1500 or less ATK is Special Summoned to your field while your opponent controls a face-up monster: Special Summon as many monsters as possible with the same name as the Summoned monster, from your hand, Deck, and Graveyard, in Attack Position, also your opponent Special Summons as many monsters as possible with the same name as 1 of their face-up monsters, from their hand, Deck, and Graveyard.

10080320.name: Jurassic World
10080320.text: All Dinosaur-Type monsters gain 300 ATK and DEF.

39910367.name: Magical Citadel of Endymion
39910367.text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. If a card with a Spell Counter(s) is destroyed, place its Spell Counters on this card. Once per turn, if you would activate a card effect by removing a Spell Counter(s) from a card you control, you can remove that many Spell Counters from this card instead. If this card would be destroyed, you can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card instead.

80921533.name: Mausoleum of the Emperor
80921533.text: During any Main Phase: The turn player can pay 1000 LP x the number of monsters normally needed for the Tribute Summon of a monster (max. 2000); that player Normal Summons/Sets that monster without Tributing. (This is their one Normal Summon/Set for that turn. This is not a Tribute Summon.)

45906428.name: Miracle Fusion
45906428.text: Fusion Summon 1 "Elemental HERO" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field or your GY.

74055055.name: Oil
74055055.text: Target up to 2 Level 4 or lower FIRE monsters with different names in your GY; add them to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Oil" per turn.

3659803.name: Overload Fusion
3659803.text: Fusion Summon 1 DARK Machine Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your field or GY.

63035430.name: Skyscraper
63035430.text: If an "Elemental HERO" monster attacks a monster that has a higher ATK, the attacking monster gains 1000 ATK during damage calculation only.

75014062.name: Spell Power Grasp
75014062.text: Target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on; place 1 Spell Counter on that target, then you can add 1 "Spell Power Grasp" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Spell Power Grasp" per turn.

79816536.name: Summoner's Art
79816536.text: Add 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.

1784686.name: The Eye of Timaeus
1784686.text:
(This card is also always treated as "Legendary Dragon Timaeus".)
Target 1 "Dark Magician" monster you control; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that lists that monster on the field as Fusion Material, using it as the Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "The Eye of Timaeus" per turn.

911883.name: Unexpected Dai
911883.text: If you control no monsters: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from the Deck.

11593137.name: Chaos Trap Hole
11593137.text: When a LIGHT or DARK monster(s) would be Summoned: Pay 2000 LP; negate the Summon of the LIGHT and DARK monster(s), and if you do, banish it.

37412656.name: Hero Blast
37412656.text: Target 1 "Elemental HERO" Normal Monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand, then if your opponent controls any monsters with ATK less than or equal to that target's ATK, destroy 1 of them.

34717238.name: Pulling the Rug
34717238.text: Negate the activation and effect of an Effect Monster whose effect activated when a monster was Normal Summoned (even itself), and destroy that Effect Monster.

21481146.name: Radiant Mirror Force
21481146.text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while they control 3 or more Attack Position monsters: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

44397496.name: Red-Eyes Spirit
44397496.text: Target 1 "Red-Eyes" monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

91597389.name: Roll Out!
91597389.text: Target 1 Union monster in your Graveyard; equip that target to a monster you control that would be an appropriate target for that Union monster's effect.

63323539.name: Trojan Blast
63323539.text: Activate only when an opponent's card effect shifts control of a monster from your side of the field to theirs. Destroy that 1 monster and inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

75380687.name: Amulet Dragon
75380687.text:
"Dark Magician" + 1 Dragon monster_x000D_
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials or with "The Eye of Timaeus". If this card is Special Summoned: Target any number of Spells in any GY(s) (min.1); banish those targets, and if you do, this card gains 100 ATK for each card banished by this effect. If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

41517968.name: Elemental HERO Darkbright
41517968.text:
"Elemental HERO Sparkman" + "Elemental HERO Necroshade"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing Battle Damage to your opponent. If this card attacks, change it to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step. If this card is destroyed: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

29343734.name: Elemental HERO Electrum
29343734.text:
"Elemental HERO Avian" + "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix" + "Elemental HERO Clayman" + "Elemental HERO Bubbleman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. While face-up on the field, this card is also WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH-Attribute. When this card is Fusion Summoned: Shuffle all banished cards into the Deck(s). This card gains 300 ATK for each monster your opponent controls that shares an Attribute with this card.

14225239.name: Elemental HERO Mariner
14225239.text:
"Elemental HERO Bubbleman" + "Elemental HERO Avian"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. While you have any face-down card(s) in your Spell & Trap Card Zones, this card can attack your opponent directly.

52031567.name: Elemental HERO Mudballman
52031567.text:
"Elemental HERO Bubbleman" + "Elemental HERO Clayman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways.

81003500.name: Elemental HERO Necroid Shaman
81003500.text:
"Elemental HERO Wildheart" + "Elemental HERO Necroshade"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target, then Special Summon 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard to their side of the field.

60493189.name: Elemental HERO Plasma Vice
60493189.text:
"Elemental HERO Sparkman" + "Elemental HERO Bladedge"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing Battle Damage to your opponent. You can discard 1 card to target 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

47737087.name: Elemental HERO Rampart Blaster
47737087.text:
"Elemental HERO Clayman" + "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix"_x000D_
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position, but only if your opponent controls no monsters, and if it does, this card's ATK is halved during damage calculation only.

25366484.name: Elemental HERO Shining Flare Wingman
25366484.text:
"Elemental HERO Flame Wingman" + "Elemental HERO Sparkman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 300 ATK for each "Elemental HERO" card in your Graveyard. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster in the Graveyard.

81197327.name: Elemental HERO Steam Healer
81197327.text:
"Elemental HERO Burstinatrix" + "Elemental HERO Bubbleman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Gain Life Points equal to the ATK of that destroyed monster in the Graveyard.

83121692.name: Elemental HERO Tempest
83121692.text:
"Elemental HERO Avian" + "Elemental HERO Sparkman" + "Elemental HERO Bubbleman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can send 1 other card you control to the Graveyard to target 1 monster you control; while this card is face-up on the field, that monster cannot be destroyed by battle.

55615891.name: Elemental HERO Wild Wingman
55615891.text:
"Elemental HERO Wildheart" + "Elemental HERO Avian"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can discard 1 card to target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.

10526791.name: Elemental HERO Wildedge
10526791.text:
"Elemental HERO Wildheart" + "Elemental HERO Bladedge"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card can attack every monster your opponent controls (one attack on each monster per Battle Phase).

58859575.name: VW-Tiger Catapult
58859575.text:
"V-Tiger Jet" + "W-Wing Catapult"_x000D_
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

84243274.name: VWXYZ-Dragon Catapult Cannon
84243274.text:
"VW-Tiger Catapult" + "XYZ-Dragon Cannon"_x000D_
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish that target. When this card declares an attack on an opponent's monster: You can target the attack target; change that attack target's battle position. (Flip Effects are not activated.)

48686504.name: Lonefire Blossom
48686504.text: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 face-up Plant monster; Special Summon 1 Plant monster from your Deck.

54514594.name: Volcanic Hammerer
54514594.text: Once per turn, you can inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of "Volcanic" monsters in your Graveyard x 200. If you activate this effect, this card cannot attack during this turn.

17415895.name: Volcanic Slicer
17415895.text: Once per turn, you can inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If you activate this effect, this card cannot attack during this turn.

18430390.name: Winged Rhynos
18430390.text: During either player's turn, when a Trap Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand.

43892408.name: Dark Magician Girl the Dragon Knight
43892408.text:
"Dark Magician Girl" + 1 Dragon monster_x000D_
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials or with "The Eye of Timaeus". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target.

28677304.name: Elemental HERO Dark Neos
28677304.text:
"Elemental HERO Neos" + "Neo-Spacian Dark Panther"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling the above cards you control into the Deck. (You do not use "Polymerization".) If this card is not already targeting a monster with its effect: You can target 1 face-up Effect Monster on the field; while you control this face-up card, that target's effect on the field is negated. During the End Phase: Shuffle this card into the Extra Deck.

59388357.name: Circle of the Fire Kings
59388357.text: Target 1 FIRE monster you control and 1 FIRE monster in your GY; destroy that monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon that other monster from your GY. You can only activate 1 "Circle of the Fire Kings" per turn.

94145683.name: Swallow's Nest
94145683.text: Tribute 1 face-up Winged Beast-Type monster; Special Summon 1 Winged Beast-Type monster from your Deck with the same Level the Tributed monster had on the field.

79333300.name: Spiritual Wind Art - Miyabi
79333300.text: Tribute 1 WIND monster, then target 1 card your opponent controls; place that card on the bottom of the Deck.

69933858.name: Gilford the Legend
69933858.text: Cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can equip as many Equip Spell Cards from your Graveyard as possible to a Warrior-Type monster(s) you control.

5438492.name: Warrior Lady of the Wasteland
5438492.text: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH Warrior-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

31423101.name: Divine Sword - Phoenix Blade
31423101.text: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 300 ATK. During your Main Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish 2 Warrior monsters from your GY; add this card to your hand.

29436665.name: Dark Eradicator Warlock
29436665.text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Each time a Normal Spell Card is activated, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent immediately after it resolves.

55424270.name: Mythical Beast Cerberus
55424270.text: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. Gains 500 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled, remove all Spell Counters on it.

46128076.name: Ebon Magician Curran
46128076.text: During your Standby Phase, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

6337436.name: Rapid-Fire Magician
6337436.text: Inflict 400 damage to your opponent each time you activate a Normal Spell Card.

91819979.name: Magical Blast
91819979.text: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each Spellcaster monster you control. During your Draw Phase, if this card is in your GY, before you draw: You can give up your normal draw this turn, and if you do, add this card to your hand.

55737443.name: Exxod, Master of The Guard
55737443.text: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "sphinx" monster. Each time an EARTH monster is Flip Summoned while this card remains face-up on the field, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

92736188.name: Great Spirit
92736188.text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned, you can switch the original ATK and DEF of 1 face-up EARTH monster on the field until the end of this turn.

73648243.name: Sand Moth
73648243.text: When this face-down Defense Position card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, except by battle, switch the original ATK and DEF of this card and Special Summon it.

28120197.name: Canyon
28120197.text: If a Rock-Type monster in Defense Position is attacked, double any Battle Damage to the controller of the attacking monster.

85852291.name: Magical Mallet
85852291.text: Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into the Deck, then draw that same number of cards.

14989021.name: Simorgh, Bird of Divinity
14989021.text: This card cannot be Special Summoned. If you Tribute Summon this card, all Tributes must be WIND. Each player takes 1000 damage during each of their End Phases, while this card remains face-up on the field. This damage is decreased by 500 for each Spell/Trap Card the player controls.

40384720.name: Sonic Shooter
40384720.text: If there are no cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone, this card can attack your opponent directly. If it does, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is the original ATK of this card.

81896370.name: Swift Birdman Joe
81896370.text: If you Tribute Summon this card by Tributing a WIND monster, return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the owners' hands.

6924874.name: Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon
6924874.text:
This card gains effects based on the number of "Harpie" monsters you control, except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon".
 1 or more: Your opponent cannot target "Harpie" monsters you control for attacks, except "Harpie's Pet Baby Dragon".
 2 or more: Double the original ATK and DEF of this card.
 3 or more: Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

77778835.name: Hysteric Party
77778835.text: Activate this card by discarding 1 card; Special Summon as many copies of "Harpie Lady" as possible from your Graveyard. When this face-up card leaves the field, destroy those monsters.

53567095.name: Icarus Attack
53567095.text: Tribute 1 Winged Beast-Type monster, then target 2 cards on the field; destroy them.

46668237.name: Green Baboon, Defender of the Forest
46668237.text: When a face-up Beast monster you control is destroyed and sent to the GY, while this card is in your hand or GY (except during the Damage Step): You can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon this card.

51962254.name: Hunter Owl
51962254.text: This card gains 500 ATK for each face-up WIND monster you control. While you control another face-up WIND monster, your opponent cannot select this card as an attack target.

44887817.name: Miracle Fertilizer
44887817.text: Once per turn: You can target 1 Plant monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. You cannot Normal Summon/Set during the turn you Special Summon with this effect (even if this card leaves the field). If a monster Special Summoned by this effect leaves the field, destroy this card.

89312388.name: Elemental HERO Prisma
89312388.text: Once per turn: You can reveal 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, then send 1 of the Fusion Materials whose name is mentioned on that card from your Deck to the GY; this card's name becomes the sent monster's until the End Phase.

9287078.name: Dark Renewal
9287078.text: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s): Target 1 of those monsters and 1 Spellcaster monster you control; send both monsters to the GY, then you can Special Summon 1 DARK Spellcaster monster from your Deck or GY.
